1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.content:
Steven did his best to disguise himself, pulling Triss's hood up over his head and looking downward so no one could get a good look at his lovely face. He slowed down as the reached the edge of town, carefully ducking to look around a corner.

To his consternation, Luke just marched on past him and on down the street. "What are you doing?!?!" Steven rasped with Triss's charming, Americanized accent.

"I'm Geralt. He doesn't slink around. Don't worry, I can take care of myself and you, ma'am." Luke turned his head and gave Steven a wink and a smile.

"He's getting as arrogant as the real Geralt." he whispered under his breath. "Granted he's not in as big a risk or imprisonment and torture as I am."

Rob bumped into Steven's backside. "Oops. Sorry." he said sheepishly, taking a moment to moisten and straighten his mustache and goatee with a finger he'd licked.

"Keep your hands to yourself unless you want to find out what a torched weed smells like, DANDELION." Steven snapped.

"Jesus...sorry Steven!" Rob protested.

Following Luke/Geralt's lead, the pair headed toward what looked to be a tavern of some kind. As they did so, they passed a group of finely dressed halfling merchants riding by on a cart filled to the brim with trade goods.

Behind them, observing them and the scene around them from the shadows, the long nosed, long limbed figure who'd been trailing them watched. It looked at the group of halflings. In seconds, it's silhouette grew shorter and quite different. Moments later, a halfling decked in green and rich blue finery that looked like the spitting image of one of the passing merchants stepped out onto the street and headed toward the tavern after Luke, Steven, and Rob. The short fellow smiled.
1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.title: Meanwhile, with "Geralt" and company.

1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.content:
"Ugh, can we rest up a while?" Liam whined, trailing behind Liz and Natalie. He was feeling thoroughly fed up and embarrassed, his ample bosom bouncing healthily with each step he took. As he navigated obstacles on their cross-country path, he had to keep hitching up his dress, revealing his smooth ankles, the high heeled court shoes on his feet hardly the appropriate footwear for such terrain. He lamented the fact that they'd ditched their horses earlier.

"Stop complaining Liam! Bloody hell, I swear this is like being back at work." Natalie interjected, as she glanced back and frowned at her now attractive, female-bodied co-worker.

Liam snapped back this time. "Hey!! You've been a woman the whole time, I haven't. And you're not wearing these stupid fucking heels." He barked in his sexy female voice, while looking down at Natalie's/Keira's bare feet, just visible under the hem of her multi-colored dress.

"Nobody is stopping you from taking your heels off, dear!" Natalie feigned a smile, acting very much like the 'stuck up' sorceress Keira could be.

"Enough!" Liz chimed in, stopping the argument in it's tracks. Her new voice was VERY firm and authoritative, and Yenn's scowl was not one to be ignored, regardless of who was in her body at the time. "Natalie, don't provoke him. And Liam... stop your bitching! We're all stuck in this world, not just you, and yes whereas you have more to deal with than we do due to your sex change, complaining about your new 'assets' won't change the fact that you have them. Suck it up!" Liz berated them both, especially Liam. "Now," Liz said, in a much calmer tone of voice, "Liam... do you have any idea where we are?" She asked him.

Liam rolled his beautiful green eyes and ran his fingers through his short, black cropped hair, before looking at their surroundings. "No, I don't!" He grumbled. "But if we were heading north, then there's a city to the... er... northeast I think, Oxen... something, Oxenfurt, that's it. And I remember from the game that there was a crossroads to the west somewhere, where there's a small village and an Inn." He explained. "Then there's Novigrad, of course, straight north, where we were going anyway." But that city is even more dangerous than any other around here."

"I'm for heading to Oxenfurt, I've had enough of bloody trees, peasants and swamps." Natalie sighed.

Liam shook his head. "Not a good idea. We might all be captured and killed, since sorceresses are not very popular in most places. And I don't really want to be burned at the stake." He mumbled, as he adjusted his dress under his juicy breasts.

"A fair point!" Liz nodded, using a gloved hand to brush her long, dark tresses behind her right ear. "But... our friends could be there, if they're here at all. And they could be in trouble. We could try and remain unseen, and defend ourselves if we're attacked." She continued, pacing in her heeled boots.

"I say we go to the village at the crossroads, but that's just me." Liam grumbled, shrugging his slender, partly exposed shoulders. He looked increasingly irritated.

Liz, who was used to being the one in charge, gently rubbed her chin as she thought it over.
1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.title: With Yennefer/Liz and company.

1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.content:
Kiran did her best to get comfortable. The villagers who'd taken her in, cared for her, and filled her belly had been kind enough to fix up some quarters for her in one of their barns. It smelled like animals, was covered in hay and stray, and was about as far from the 21st century conveniences the young woman had always lived with as could possibly be, but with candles and a small brazier burning, it actually felt kind of cozy.

She sat on a small stool and looked down at herself. She'd stripped out of her leather trousers, and sat there clad only in her crudely patched and repaired billowy white tunic, small undergarments, and her boots that she'd slipped back onto her feel to prevent herself from picking up any filth from the barn's floor.

She looked down at the lovely breasts peeking out of her tunic, at the creamy, but taught thighs that now made up her lap. She was still trying to wrap her head around the obvious knowledge that she was in someone else's body. A very fit, very beautiful, someone else. "At least I'm hot." She laughed, only half-serious.

The sound of a door snapping shut caused her to bolt up from the stool! To Kira's shock, she found herself spinning on her boots, retrieving her nearby sword from it's scabbard, and spinning around to face the surprise with absolutely no hesitation. It was like she'd been on auto-pilot or something.

Her visitor gasped. "I-I'm sorry! I didn't mean to startle you Miss!" Astrid approached her nervously. The young woman's dark brow hair was down, framing her cute face as the firelight danced over her cheeks. She wore loose fitting, rustic bed-clothes. They clung to her body, showing off her lithe, pretty young body.

"It's okay. I'm just on edge. I'm sorry I scared you back!" Kiran put her sword back in it's scabbard. She turned around to face Astrid. She couldn't help but smile.

<God, she's cute. Farm work or whatever agrees with her, she has a great little bod...Jesus! Why am I thinking this?!?!" Kiran blushed and cleared her throat. "Uh...again. Sorry. Is there anything I can do for you?"

Astrid bit her lip, wringing her hands as she looked down at the ground between them. "I-I just wanted to make sure you were comfortable for the night. I know you're leaving tomorrow and I wanted to make sure you remembered our hospitality."

"There's no need to worry about that. I'll always remember you." Kiran wrinkled her nose. <Why did I say that?!?! What a shitty come-on?!?!>

Astrid blushed a bit. "That makes me happy. I'll never forget you, either. It's not everyday a beautiful woman washes up on these shores!"

"I'm glad I don't have to compete with any other women for space on your mind." Kiran answered without even thinking about it. <Oh, for the love of...>

"Although you're a bit foolish, despite all your beauty." Astrid rushed over to a barrel and retrieved a bucket, various pieces of cloth, and soap of some kind.

"I beg your pardon?" Kiran tilted her head, brushing a strand of white hair out of her eyes as she looked at her pretty visitor.

"Walking around without breeches or a skirt in the barn, you'll bet your legs filthy!" Astrid marched over and pushed Kiran onto the stool.

"I-I put my boots on, it's no big..." Kiran protested with Ciri's voice.

"Don't be a dullard. Let me wash them." Astrid bent down before her and gave Kiran a strange smile.

Kiran's heart raised as the young woman slowly pulled her tall boots off. Filling a rag with soapy, clean water, she began to slowly run the sopping mass up and down Kiran's smooth, lovely new legs. It was less scrubbing, and more an exercise in being gently caressed.

<What is happening here?!?! I'm getting turned on?!?!" Kiran moaned a bit as pleasure began to grow in her new nether-regions. "I-I thought you weren't familiar with women who preferred women?"

Astrid winked at her, as she seemed to take great pleasure in running her hands up and down Kiran's beautiful legs. "I'm not. Never considered it. But you gave me a lot to think about this afternoon. In fact, it's all I can think about. I think I'd regret it for the rest of my life if I let you leave tomorrow without at least exploring some...things."

Kiran shook her head. She had to stop this! She was NOT a lesbian, damn it! She had a boyfriend back home, for fuck's sake! She reached out and placed her hands on the sides of Astrid's head. She stood up, dragging the young woman with her. "That's enough of that. We're done." she said with great force.

She spun the startled Astrid around, before pushing her down onto the stool herself. "Now, let's wash your legs." Kiran licked her lips.

Astrid smiled as she pulled her loose fitting bedclothes up, exposing her own soft, thin limbs. Kiran began to run her delicate new hands and fingers up the young woman's thighs. <I-I don't want to do this, but it just feels so damned good.>
1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.title: Kiran's night in Lofoten.

1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.content:
"Now, before we do anything else, why don't we see just what you're capable of." Philippa said in a loud, clear voice (as she always did) as she clicked over to Rebekah in her high heeled shoes. "If my suspicions are correct, and they usually are, you are more finely attuned to Rita's body than you think you are. Using her vast knowledge of magic and putting it into practical application should be no trouble."

"Er... come again?" Rebekah mumbled, frowning at Philippa. Even though she had stopped crying now, Rebekah's beautiful new face still showed signs of the many tears she had shed over the past several hours.

Letting out a midly frustrated sigh, Philippa took hold of Rebekah's right arm and raised it gently. "Open your hand, palm facing up, we'll start off with a simple offensive spell. Now... look at your palm and concentrate, think... fire." Philippa told Rebekah, as she stepped behind her, lowering both her hands onto her svelte waist. Rebekah looked down for a second, feeling slightly uncomfortable, but then she stared at her open hand and focused as hard as she could. "The application of magic could not be easier, little one, it's all about focus, you can do this." Philippa cooed in an oddly reassuring voice, as her hands crept up Rebekah's sides a little further, stopping just short of her perfect breasts.

Continuing to focus, Rebekah's eyes suddenly went wide in shock as a condensed ball of fire with a glowing edge appeared in her hand. Afraid of burning her hand, Rebekah threw her hand in a downward motion, back by her side, making the magic disappear.

"That was all right, but you have to push the fear aside my dear, your own magic cannot hurt you." Philippa said. "Now, why don't we try frost magic, Rita always did have a penchant for that. Fire is more Triss's thing." She added.

"Who's Triss?" Rebekah inquired, raising her hand to look at it again.

"All in good time." Philippa responded, not answering Rebekah's question. "Now, raise your hand again, and this time... think of frost or ice." As she said this, she maneuvered herself to the side of Rebekah, letting loose of her waist but moving in closer, to catch a scent of Rita's musky perfume. She leveled Rebekah's arm with her manicured hand, and smiled when Rebekah was able to conjure a swirling ball of frost magic. "There you go, you're a natural." Philippa said, sounding like a teacher mildly impressed with her student.

"Wow, I... um... thank you." Rebekah gasped, smiling to herself. She was beginning to feel the power coarse through her goddess-like body.

"Hmm, my pleasure, little one." Philippa muttered gently, her mischievous smile not disappearing.
1352133313112133221323222312121124242122.title: Rebekah & Philippa.

1353.content:
One of our protagonists comes into possession of a device or remote capable of swapping people's body parts and maybe other traits to. The exact parameters can be decided upon. This sound appealing?

If yes, who gets hold of this remote?
1353.title: A swapping device.

choices: She demonstrates on two other co-workers.
13532.content:
Phoebe was understandably giddy as she parked her car on the loading bay outside work one Monday afternoon. After switching her engine off she reached over to her purse on the passenger seat and pulled out her new 'toy'. It was a variant of a P.A.I.D (Personal Aspect Interchanging Device). Basically it allowed her two swap people's traits. She could swap people's bodies, individual body parts, clothing, personalities etc., and only she would be aware. Reality would shift so everyone else would think everything was normal. "Perfect place to give you another try-out." Phoebe grinned, running her fingers over the device.

She'd already used it on some of her neighbors and some passers-by in the street that morning. Dave, the guy across the street, had looked pretty ridiculous going to work dressed in a schoolgirl's uniform. And her prissy neighbor Adele didn't look as pretty with the bald head and the biker tattoos of some guy who walked past Phoebe's house.

Phoebe kept smiling, even chuckling as she exited her car and headed into Wilkos to start her shift. Liz was just heading upstairs to chat with Elizabeth, and she smiled and greeted Phoebe as she inputted the security code on the door leading upstairs. "Afternoon Phoebe." she chirped.

"Hey Liz." Phoebe responded happily.

Liz frowned as she smiled. "You seem more cheerful than usual." The supervisor said.

"Just a good day, that's all." Phoebe mumbled, without revealing too much.

After the two had reached the top of the stairs, Liz turned right and headed down the hallway towards the manager's office, while Phoebe walked straight into the tea room, where several of her co-workers were already sat awaiting the start of their shift. Phoebe glanced at her watch, they still had 20 minutes to kill. Looking around the room, she identified Nicola, Rebekah, Steven, Waggy and Liam. And then someone else entered the room after her, she turned to see who it was and saw Josh smiling at her. He was the newest employee, recently arrived from the U.S with his wife. "Hey there." he greeted Phoebe.

Phoebe had to admit, she loved Josh's accent. Hmm, I wonder if I should have an accomplice for this. Phoebe wondered with a smirk as she watched Josh grab himself a coffee.

She decided she wanted a confidante. So she walked over to Josh while he was by the sink and started talking in a loud whisper so the others wouldn't hear her. "How would you like to have some fun with everyone?" she asked initially, before showing Josh her P.A.I.D variant. and explaining to him in quick detail just what it was capable of. That took a couple of minutes, and inevitably, Josh was highly sceptical.

"Okay I can see you need proof, which is fine" Phoebe grinned, as she activated her P.A.I.D.
13532.title: Phoebe's device

135323.content:
"I'm sorry, but I think your too big for your britches?" Josh exclaimed to Phoebe. "I mean you can swap whatever you want with certain people?"

"Yeah, whatever you can think of it can be swapped." Phoebe said back to him as she then explained about the items that she swapped back before she came to work.

"I still think your full of it, I mean no offense." Josh said back to her after hearing the back story of how she came into contact with it. "And I will be able to see everything because you told me and showed me the device." Phoebe nodded and she pointed the device at Josh and then pointed it at another one of the employees and looked like she chose something and pressed the button. Josh then looked down to see that indeed something was changed. He in fact got something from...
135323.title: Josh needs more information.

1353231.content:
Josh was stunned to see that his skin was now considerably darker than it had been, On instinct he looked over to Suki as she kept chatting to the others, and she was now white. "You swapped our skin tone? Josh sputtered quietly at Phoebe, who was stood there with a silly smirk on her face, almost smug like.

"Sure did." Phoebe nodded. "I figured I might as well give you some real proof of this thing's capabilities." she said.

"I sure hope you can swap us back." Josh muttered, partly worried.

"Course I can, that was just to win you over, prove that this is real." Phoebe answered, as she reversed the swap between Josh and Suki.

"Phew!" Josh sighed in relief as he held his hands up in front of him. He was Caucasian again, and Suki's skin was back to it's usual dark color. Josh turned to Phoebe again. "Okay, you were telling the truth. Now what? What do you intend to do with that thing?" he asked her, gesturing to the P.A.I.D in her hand.

"Duh!" Phoebe answered quietly, rolling her eyes. "We have some fun with it, amuse ourselves. The shift will go a lot faster, and will be hilarious, don't you agree?" she rambled on.

Josh knew what Phoebe meant. She wanted them to use the device on their unsuspecting co-workers, to swap them around a little.

Josh couldn't see the harm, as long as none of their 'victims' were aware of the changes. "Um... sure, why not." he shrugged.

"Cool!" Phoebe grinned, as she glanced back over to the table.
1353231.title: Suki

13532313.content:
"So how does this thing work exactly," Josh wondered as he walked closer to Phoebe. "What are the settings on it?" Is it completely safe." Those were some of the questions that he asked her.

"Yes, yes, everything is completely safe." Phoebe reassured him. "There are a lot of things that we can do, random, specific, life, you name it and it can do it." She said as she went through the settings on the bracelet on her arm. "Oh here's something about random swaps between targets every 15 minutes to 2 hours."

A gleam came across Josh's eyes as he heard this. "Are you up for an adventure?" Josh wondered as he looked over to Phoebe.

"Yes, I am." She answered back to him, "Why?"

"Well, how about we set a wager," Josh started to explain the terms. "Over the course of the shift, how about we set the PAID to randomly swap traits from 2 other people and set it to be every 15 minutes to 2 hours. That way we don't know when exactly it's going to take place. The swaps will end at the end of the shift and begin again at the start of the next shift. The first person to complain about it loses the bet." Josh offered.

"What would be the wagers?" Phoebe asked as she seemed to liking what she heard.

"How about if I win you have to do something for me for 1 night." Josh asked "And if you win, then I have to do something for you for 1 night. It can involve the PAID or not, doesn't matter."

"I like it, but we get to pick who we swap with and it has to be of the opposite gender." Phoebe said back to him and Josh nodded in agreement."

"I like those terms." Josh agreed as they both looked around for people they didn't mind swapping with. "I know who I want to swap with do you?"

Phoebe nodded as she aimed the PAID toward the person she wanted to swap with. Josh looked over to see that the light from the PAID hit Mark. Josh knew him from when Steven helped show him around the first night. Phoebe then turned the PAID on herself and shot herself. "Right, now who is it that you wanted to swap with?" She wondered as she looked over to Josh.

"Well, I think I would like to swap with that person over there." Josh said as he pointed to a group of girls talking around a table. "I don't know her name but she is over there on the right." Josh was pointing to a group of girls that included Charlotte, Becca, Mona, and Laura.

"Okay, I think I know who your talking about." She said as she pointed the device over to the group of girls and fired it at the group of girls. Josh wasn't really paying attention to where she was firing and thought she knew which one he was pointing to. She then pointed it at him and pressed the button. "There, I set it for random and the first one should be in roughly 15 minutes or so." She said as she put down her arm.

"So what can I expect to swap." Josh wondered. "You know what kind of swaps."

"Well, from what I saw, we can do body parts, which this is mostly set for, life swaps, job stuff, etc. So mostly body parts will change much like you saw earlier." Phoebe told him as Liz came up to tell them that it's time to start their shift.

*** What Josh didn't know was that Phoebe didn't choose who he wanted, he was pointing to Becca,
but instead chose somebody else.***
13532313.title: Josh suggests something.

135323132.content:
It was ten minutes before anything happened, and it took a minute for Phoebe to notice it. She was working as usual and thinking about the PAID, when she suddenly thought about showing the device to her girlfriend Vicki when she got home. The smirk on her face disappeared for a moment when she realized... she didn't have a girlfriend, in fact she wasn't even a lesbian. But Mark had a girlfriend called Vicki.

"It swapped our relationships??" Phoebe wondered. It was weird, she knew Vicki couldn't possibly have been her girlfriend, and yet... she was. She thought about going to inform Josh what her swap had been, a non=physical one, but with Liz walking around checking up on her staff, it maybe wasn't the time.

"Does this mean Mark has my boyfriend?" Phoebe giggled. "Probably."

It was an interesting swap to be sure, but Phoebe wasn't blown away by it. She wondered if Josh's swap would be more drastic than hers. She'd have to keep an eye out for him in the aisles.

It was actually Mark who Phoebe saw first, and she couldn't help yourself. "Hey Mark, how are you? Everything all right at home?" she asked.

Her lanky co-worker stopped and approached Phoebe. "Hmm, not too bad, he can be annoying at times, so it's a good job I love him." Mark smiled.

"Well, all partners can be annoying. Vicki can be." Phoebe nodded in agreement, trying not to smile too much.

"You two getting on okay?" Mark inquired.

"I think so," Phoebe answered vaguely, which was the best she could do given the circumstances. Mark then noticed Liz coming down the aisle and so he vacated the area, leaving Phoebe to return to work.

"Yes, maybe you should switch work shirts, and Charlotte... I don't think you need your bra now. But Steven does." Liz said.

A couple of minutes later, with more of their clothing switched, Steven and Charlotte now had each other's bodies from the neck down, and were actually a lot more comfortable, especially Charlotte. Their heads still looked out of place though. Eorlund had no intention of swapping those however.

15531111.content:
''I thought you didn't smoke?'', Charlotte motioned at the rollies between Kiran's middle and index finger as the petite girl made her way to a secluded part outside Wilko's building to join Charlotte and Jade, who were already there for their break.

The barely 5ft tall brunette produced a lighter from her pocket and lit an end, before inhaling from the other end, ''I try not to, you know,'' Kiran shrugged and smiled at her two co-workers. Her frame shook gently, but in the end, she coughed and exhaled some smoke. Kiran brought the rolled-up cigarette up and take another drag.

''Isn't that what Liam usually smokes?'', Jade recognized the distinctive brand on the cigarette paper.

''What? Let me see,'' Charlotte held Kiran's hand steady while she took a good look at the rolled-up cigarette,''How can anyone smoke this shit?'' the older Wilkos staff turned away in disgust.

''Well, I quite like it,'' Kiran laughed at Charlotte's jibe. She wasn't ruffled at all by Charlotte's rather 'rude' and obnoxious behaviour. Although she'd just been very recently 'loaned' to the current Wilkos to help out and to get some training, she had been able to integrate well with the rest of the staff.

''Speaking of Liam,'' Charlotte opened her mouth again, '' I can't understand how he's still working here,''

''What'd you mean?'', Jade exhaled a long stream of smoke.

''Guy's a slacker,'' Charlotte complained, '' and a perv,'' the girl adds quickly. ''I once caught him staring at Becca's ass when they worked together stocking up the toiletries.''

''Becca does have a nice ass,'' Kiran said dreamily as she stared at Jade's almost C-cup chest.

''Huh? Did you say something?'' Jade turned to Kiran, making the latter break her gaze.

''Nothing,'' Kiran murmured as she took another drag from her rapidly shortening cigarette,''Probably the guy couldn't help it. Even I want to take a look sometimes,'' Kiran giggled, the image of Becca's ass forming on her mind.

''I think you caught Liam-itis,'' Charlotte rolled her eyes, ''Speaking of which, this is the second time you've covered his shift this week. Don't feel like you have to do it just because Liz assigned you with him. I don't even know what Miss Big Tits was thinking.''

''Oh, don't worry about that,'' Kiran said and threw the stump of her cigarette, before extinguishing it with her sole, ''I could use the extra money and experience anyway,''

''You're working too hard,'' Jade laughed. ''Besides, what happened to him anyway?''

Kiran folded her arms under her B-cup bosom, ''Oh, he's doing other things, I think. He didn't say much.''

''I bet he's just too lazy to turn up to work. '' Charlotte snickered and snuffed out her cigarette. ''I say we should get back now before Miss Big Tits comes out to find us,''

''Right behind you,'' Kiran followed the two employees as they walked back to the building from the staff entrance, while admiring their asses.

***


''Great work all,'' Liz said as every employee shuffled out from the staff room.

As Kiran made her way out of the store, she saw some employees huddling around the entrance talking among themselves. Just out of sheer curiousity she made her way towards them.

''Oh, Kiran,'' Luke greeted her,''We're going to have a pint before going home, want to tag along?''

''Who's 'we'?'', Kiran walked closer to the group and saw the faces more clearly.

''Uh, yeah,'' Luke muttered, ''Steven, Charlotte, Rob, Shaun, Aaron, Natalie, Melissa," He pointed to the people standing there, ''Oh, of course I'll be coming, and Liz and Elizabeth might come along after they lock up, at least that's what Liz said,''

''That's what she said,'' Rob quipped, perhaps a bit too loudly.

''Ignore this guy,'' Natalie laughed and turned to Kiran, ''We could get to know each other better,''

''Yeah, sure,'' Kiran smiled. Unconsciously, she patted her small duffel bag, where a Costume Gun was hidden underneath some clothes.

''Is Jessica still around?'' Natalie scanned the horizon for a few seconds, ''We could ask her to tag along too.''

''Oh, come on then. Are we just going to be standing around?'' Aaron grumbled.

Kiran looked around and she soon spotted the red-haired girl standing by the bus stop. ''I think I saw her, I'll go and ask.''

''Go on,'' Luke nods.

***


''Hey, do you want to tag along for a pint?'' Kiran asked the red-haired girl.

''I wish I could, but I'm just dead tired,'' Jessica gave her friend a weak smile, her eyes still trained to the distance, expecting a bus to pop up anytime soon. Kiran tried a few more times to persuade her friend, but was met with the same refusal.

Kiran eyed Jessica's frame up and down. Maybe it's time to take a new body out for a spin. Kiran looked at the group who had been waiting patiently, On the other hand, there was some more people that Liam wanted to try out too.
15531111.title: Liam

choices: She follows a co-worker to the toilets.
155311111.content:
After a moment's thought, 'Kiran' decided to let Jessica go home undisturbed. They were both in again tomorrow anyway, along with everyone else. "Oh okay then, but we'll have to have some fun some time." Kiran caressed Jessica's shoulder with her dainty hand, giving it a squeeze as her eyes once more locked onto Jessica's sexy little rump, her pert breasts and the high heels she loved to wear so much.

"Oh yeah, definitely." Jessica smiled, nodding as she looked down at her friend.

With that, Kiran turned around and headed back to the rest of her co-workers. She had more choice amongst this lot anyway. "Jessica's tired, we've agreed to go out some other time though. We going?" she said to Luke, approaching him.

"Absolutely, let's go guys." Luke gestured to everyone.

By the time Kiran had returned to the others, Liz and Elizabeth had locked up the store, but Elizabeth also took a 'rain check'. She had to get home since her fiance's youngest child was sick. "See ya tomorrow." Kiran waved at her manager as she clicked down the street in her glossy black heels. Again, Kiran was a little disappointed about the departure of another co-worker, but there were still several left.

"You're not going to start bossing us around are you Liz?" Charlotte suddenly asked. She was half joking, trying to hide the fact that she wasn't impressed that 'Miss Big Tits' was accompanying them.

Liz laughed slightly. "I'm not your supervisor outside of the store Charlotte, you know that."

"Yeah but still, you might be tempted." Charlotte mumbled.

Kiran smirked, listening to the banter as she her co-workers walked around the corner to the nearest pub.

********

"Alright, I'll buy the first round." Liz said, calling a barmaid over to them as they sat around two tables close together. This made Liz instantly more popular, even with Charlotte, who definitely loved her alcohol.

"Just a coke for me." Kiran spoke up. She wanted to keep a clear mind, and she rested her bag on her lap as she sat there, protecting it from any prying eyes or hands in the immediately vicinity. Kiran ignored Charlotte as she made fun of her for ordering a coke. And then, Kiran, looked at each of her co-workers in turn, but not really lingering too long on Steven, Rob, Luke, Shaun and Aaron. She sized up Melissa, Charlotte, Liz and then Natalie in turn. Each had their good points and bad points. Liz for instance was a little chubby around the waist, but she had the biggest breasts in Wilko by far. Charlotte was a little on the tall side at 5' 9", but Kiran liked the contrast between her and the others. Natalie's teeth weren't prefectly alined, but unless she smiled, it wasn't noticeable, and she was still cute. And then there was Melissa, her other friend from the Parkgate store. She was a looker, with a decent figure.

"You're quiet Kiran. You okay?" Liz suddenly snapped the girl from her train of thought.

"Oh, yes Liz, I'm great thank you." Kiran smirked, hugging her duffel bag as she sipped her coke.

Moments later, nobody noticed Kiran slipping a hand down to her crotch.

No, let another female find it.
1553121.content: How about Sukhi, the girl from India?
1553121.title: someone from the cast.

15531211.content:
"Uncle Adesh, are you in here?" Sukhi asked hesitantly as she peered around the corner. The room was all dark and she could see nobody. Sukhi felt around the wall and finally found the light switch and activated it. All the fluorescent lamps turned on at once, showing off a laboratory.

Sukhi was here on orders from her parents. They hadn't heard from Adesh for several weeks now and they were worried about him. Sukhi on the other hand thought it was nicely quiet at home. Her uncle would come at her house once a month to show off his newest inventions. To say they weren't successful was putting it mildly. Sukhi still remembered the toaster-incident. Hearing the sound of a toaster made her jump down.

But now things were quiet for some time, so her parents asked her to visit her uncle while on her way to work. She hadn't been here since she was a little girl. Uncle Adesh liked his privacy. The front door was unlocked as Sukhi just pushed it. Walking inside she could see the living room was sparsely decorated. There was only one picture of uncle Adesh and the rest of the family. Going further inside she walked into the kitchen. She saw it wasn't cleaned in a while; there were even a few maggots crawling around in the sink. Sukhi quickly left the kitchen seeing that. The next room she found herself in was her uncle's laboratory. Looking around Sukhi was curious to see what her uncle invented. At the least she could warn her parents about it. But the place was empty. No inventions, no tools, nothing. Except for one thing. On the workbench she found a small little gun, similar to a kid's toy. Was this what her uncle had been doing this whole time? Inventing a toy for children?

Sukhi picked up the gun and put it in her bag. She then left the laboratory and checked out the rest of the house. Checking upstairs she noticed the bed had been used recently but her uncle's favorite lab coat was still lying on a nearby chair. He would never remove that old thing. In the bathroom she saw the toilet hadn't been flushed for a while, yet there were traces of shaving cream in the sink.

Sukhi bit on her underlip as she didn't like this. It looked like the house was used recently, but why were there no signs of her uncle? What if it was a killer that was using her uncle's house and she would be next! Feeling her heart pumping faster Sukhi quickly went down the stairs and out of the house as she breathed heavily. She didn't want to stay in that house any longer. She would tell her parents about it. They should call the police to investigate it. But first she needed to get to work.

"And that what's happened." Sukhi ended her story. It was break time and Sukhi decided to tell someone about what she had seen.

Who was this person she told her story to?
15531211.title: Yes, let Sukhi find the device.

1553211.content:
Aaron was standing in the loading bay of Wilkos taking his smoke break. Aaron nervously picked out a cigarette and lit it up. Aaron was a 28, 5'10 Brit who worked at a large hardware store near downtown London. Aaron had a short temper, one that was often flared up through a combination of not being able to smoke in the store and having to deal with clueless customers and his fellow co-workers.

Aaron had just stormed out of the store after Elizabeth, his manager, had told him he had to work the whole weekend. Aaron had planned to go to the football match on Saturday with a bunch of his friends, but now he had to work from 9 to 5. "Fuckin' cunt. Tellin' me to work the whole weekend. Piss off."

Aaron angrily puffed away on his cigarette as Helen, the one co-worker Aaron actually got along with, joined him outside.

"I can't believe that cunt gave you the whole weekend!" Helen sharply told Aaron as she lit up a cigarette.

"Thats two weeks in a row! Do we really have so few people that we can't rotate or something?" Aaron complained as he continued to explain his anger.

"I had god damn plans! I was supposed to be getting fucking drunk with my pals."

"I'm sorry Aaron. I'd take your place but it's my anniversary this weekend." Helen told Aaron.

"Yeah, we'll you better at least have some fun. Anything sounds better than being here all weekend."



As Aaron and Helen continued to enjoy their smoke break in the alley behind their store, a loud bang was heard in the building across the alley.

"The hell was that?" Helen questioned.

Suddenly four more loud bangs filled the air. "Sounds like gunfire!" Aaron told Helen. "But that building has been closed off for months. Who the hell would've gone in there?" Helen replied.

The building used to be a small local computer business. The company that leased the space had gone out of business months ago and the space had set dormant for three months.

As Aaron and Helen stood there in worry, a woman's scream filled the air. Aaron, worried for the safety of whoever was screaming, ran towards the abandoned office and tired to enter. Helen followed closely behind. The two tried to open the door, but found the door locked. Aaron, being pretty fit, told Helen to stand back and kicked down the door.

Aaron and Helen expected to find the space vacant, but were surprised when they saw row after row of large, complex looking computers. The machines looked like they were state of the art. Rather than having monitors, the computers had holographic screens showing a strange logo with what appeared to be a human head surrounded by an atomic symbol: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c...

Aaron and Helen were surprised to find the building occupied, but were quickly drawn away from their amazement when they heard the woman scream once again calling for help.

Aaron and Helen rushed down a long hallway leading to a large high ceiling room in the center of the rather large office complex. All around the area were several dead individuals. It looked like something out of a horror movie. It looked like the dead individuals, many of whom were in lab coats, had all been shot. Several of them had been shot multiple times. Helen shrieked in horror as she walked past a man who had been shot multiple times in the head.

As Aaron and Helen observed the massacre, a woman’s voice called out, “Plea...please...help me.”

Aaron rushed over to the voice and removed a metal cabinet from a 60 year old, gray haired woman. The woman had been shot in the stomach and was bleeding out.

“Hurry....take me....take me to the computer room.”

“Computer room?” Aaron remarked, “you need to go to the hospital lady.”

“No...time....computer....now.”

Aaron, being strong enough, lifted the elderly woman off of the ground and began to run to the computer room. Helen, wanting to get away from the dead bodies, followed behind.

Aaron took the woman back down the long hallway he and Helen had just walked down and reentered the computer room.

The dying woman told Aaron, “put me in the middle of the room.”

Interestingly, in the middle of the computer room was a large metal disk that sat flush with the rest of the floor. Aaron set her down on the disk and the older woman called to Helen, “type Quantum FEM43AD into the computer.” The older woman was barely breathing now. Her breaths were short....quick...and she was ghostly pale.

Aaron tried to tend to her and sat over her on the metal disk. The woman’s breath was laborious and soon stopped. Aaron began to perform CPR on the woman. “Stay with me...stay with me...”

Helen meanwhile opened the large holographic touchscreen and began to type in the code the woman had given her. After typing in the code onto the computer screen, the large computers surrounding the room began to hum with activity. As Aaron continued to administer CPR the machines began to scream. Suddenly, a large blue light began to envelop the disk that Aaron and the woman were on. Helen watched in amazement as a sort of blue electric bubble surrounded the metal disk. Suddenly, in a flash, Aaron and the woman disappeared.

15532111.content:
Aaron was groggy and confused at what had just happened. He opened his eyes and was surprised to find himself seated on a couch in what looked like to be a break room. It definitely wasn’t the break room from the Wilkos store. Aaron looked to his right and saw a door leading to what looked to be the Beauty Salon across the street from Wilkos. Aaron faintly remembered the name of the store and tried to think of it. Beauty...beauty...

Suddenly, next to him, Aaron heard the older woman speak up, “Beautylicious.”

Aaron turned to his right and was shocked to see the woman he had recently been administering CPR to. Shockingly, the woman looked fine. She wasn’t bleeding from the stomach, and didn’t look as if she was going to die.

“How...how are you ok? You were shot. You stopped breathing.”

“Yes I did. Which is actually why the two of us are here.” The woman replied in a British accent.

“What do you mean?” Aaron questioned.

“That sequence I had your friend enter was going to save my life. Unfortunately I had to be alive when the sequence was started in order to benefit from it. Sadly, I’m now dead.”

“Dead? How can you be dead? You’re sitting right here next to me?” Aaron sternly told the woman.

“Actually...I’ve been integrated into my program. I’m a ghost in the machine if you will. It was an emergency failsafe I added yesterday. Thank God I did. Thank your for trying to help me, but your friend entered the program too late.”

Aaron told the woman not to worry about it, but he was still confused with the situation, “So if the program didn’t work. Why are we at Beautylicious? How the hell did we get here.”

“Well...the program actually did work...on you.”

“What do you...” Aaron looked down and was shocked at what he saw. Rather than his large, muscular, male body, Aaron saw two slender tan legs jutting out from a short frilly black shorts-dress. Aaron reached forward to touch the legs, and was shocked to see two, tan, slender female arms reaching forward to touch the legs. The hands were slender and hair the nails painted black as well.

He reached up to his chest and was surprised to find two mounds rather than his former firm pecks.

“What happened to me? How am I a woman? Why do I still have my own voice?”

The woman tried to calm Aaron down, “Because the sequence can only use living recipients, you were taken into the program. You are now a quantum head.”

“Quantum head? I’m a woman!”

“Well...you’re a woman now... You’re still you however. You are now a quantum head. Feel your face.”

Aaron reached up with his slender female hands and reached upwards to his face. Surprisingly, he felt his strong jawline and rough stubble rather than a smooth woman’s face. “I have my own head? I’m some man with a girl’s body?”

“To yourself, yes. To others you’re a pretty 25-year-old woman. We started this project nearly twenty years ago. We were researching ways to effectively complete teleportation. Recently, within the last five years, we made great strides and are now capable of teleporting small objects vast distances. As soon as we made this breakthrough, M16 forcibly took over our program as a method to both insert agents undercover and as a way to protect the royal family by hiding them anywhere in the word. Today we were attacked by some organization. They were trying to steal our research and pretty much destroyed it.”

“That’s all fine and dandy, but how the hell can I get back to my body? I’m not walking around dressed like this slutty tramp.” Aaron sternly told the woman.

“We’ll that is part of our current problem. The group that attacked our lab today extremely restricted our ability to recall agents to their former body. Because of that, our emergency failsafe—at a secret, hidden location—has undoubtedly activated. This means that every night at three in the morning you, and all the other agents, will swap randomly with various individuals.”

“So I may be able to be a man again?” Aaron tried to rationalize.

“Well...I told your friend to enter our female program because I though I’d get put into the system. Unfortunately you did. Your friend instituted the female head program. That means you’re stuck with only females.”

Aaron’s stomach sank. “How...how could this be possible?”

“I’m Kate by the way. The good news is that I will get to follow you everywhere you go. One of the perks of being fully integrated into a massive supercomputer.”

Aaron placed his male head down into his female hands. He muffled from in between his girly hands, “I’m Aaron.”

“Actually, you’re Vanessa Williamson. She’s a 25-year-old hairstylist at Beautylicious. You only have to work for another twenty minutes and then you get to go home for the day. You have a big date tonight.”

“Why are you telling me this. I’m not doing that shit.”

Suddenly, a curvy looking blonde woman walked into the backroom, “Vanessa I need you to get out here. Vicky is here for her appointment.”

Somehow the woman wasn’t alarmed at Aaron’s appearance, nor did it seem that she even noticed Kate’s presence in the room.

Kate spoke up to fill Aaron in on the situation “That’s Carly. She runs the shop. She’s your boss. Vicky is a friend of yours and you need to get out there and cut her hair.”

Aaron stood up and began to wobble in his high heeled boots. As he jutted his arms out to try and gain some balance, then he placed his hands on his narrow hips. Opposite of Aaron was a full length mirror. It was at this moment that Aaron had the opportunity to look at his new body in full glory: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CFTFrE8WYAAT...

Aaron...
15532111.title: Continue Aaron's journey

155321112.content:
"I can't cut anyone's hair, are you fucking crazy?" Aaron swore at his dead companion, who apparently was visible only to him. "And this..." he gestured down to his curvy new body "...is too weird! I can't be achick, especially not with my own head, I'm a freak!" he stated, peering into the mirror.

"You must do Vanessa's job while you are living her life for the next 24 hours. You don't want to get her fired do you?" Kate answered.

"I'll get her fired anyway if I make a fuck-up of someone's hair." Aaron told her.

Kate started pacing the room, taking a moment to admire the decor. "Maybe she only wants a trim, if that's the case, you should be fine. If not... then feign illness or something, ask someone else to style Vicky's hair." Kate could see that Aaron was still in shock, understandably so, his dainty hands were roaming over the bumps and curves of his new body. "Um... I'd avise against doing that around others too." Kate said to Aaron.

"What?" Aaron replied, glancing up. He wasn't the sharpest knife in the drawer.

"Feeling yourself up!" Kate muttered.

Aaron dropped his hands to his sides, then let out a deep sigh. "I need to get back to work, er... Wilkos I mean. I have to talk to Helen." he said.

"You no longer work there, at least for now. And Helen would not see you as Aaron... or even as a man. She'd see you as everyone else does, as a hair stylist named Vanessa." Kate explained to the chagrined Wilko employee.

"So... what happened to 'me' then? I mean... won't people miss me?" Aaron asked Kate.

Kate took a seat again, wondering whether it was worth it explaining the whole thing to her new 'traveling companion'.
155321112.title: Tried to get out of work

1553211121.content:
"Well... You basically never existed." Kate told Aaron, trying her best to keep him calm.

"Never existed!" Aaron angrily spewed as put his dainty hands on his feminine hips. "What does that mean?"

Kate collected herself as she sat on the couch in the Beautylicious rec room, "It means that as a quantum head, you, as Aaron, never existed. Our program messes with time, and reality itself. Despite our ability to manipulate reality we learned that once someone entered the quantum head system they ceased to be. No matter how much we tried, it seemed that only people within the system knew of the previous reality. This made keeping track of our operatives difficult, because after they entered the system no one would have any memory of them. So we initiated a system where after someone entered the system, they would fill out a biography form and send it to a specific email address. This way we could keep track. The good news is that when someone left the quantum system reality sort of fixed itself."

"So you're telling me I basically never existed?" Aaron tried to rationalize.

"Yes. Basically. Sort of like King Andrew." Kate replied.

"King Andrew?" Aaron asked.

"He was one of the first humans to enter the quantum program. He is the Queen's older brother. He ruled until about 5 years ago when his health failed him. He entered the quantum system shortly thereafter. That's why you've never heard of him. No one outside the quantum project has."

"Bollocks. The Queen never had an older brother." Aaron scoffed.

"Exactly" Kate explained, "she never had a brother in this reality. However she had one until he entered quantum."

Aaron was amazed. A large part of him disbelieved all that Kate had told him, but he also found all of this too strange to not be true. After call, that woman Carly didn't seem surprised at all seeing Aaron's head resting on the tan, sexy body of Vanessa.

"So what do I do now?" Aaron asked in a confused tone "Do I just go around woman to woman everyday? Can I get back to my body?"

"I'm working on getting you back, but it is going to take me time to crack our encryption code to find the location of our emergency fail safe. Until then it sounds like you need to either play sick or go try to be a hairstylist. Also, this Vanessa girl has a big date planned for tonight. Thus, you're provocative attire."

Aaron...
1553211121.title: Kate explains further.

1553212.content:
Special Agent Victoria Harrington walked down the pristine white corridor, the purpose in her stride hiding her uncertainty. She had been called down to the Research and Development for something extremely important, but she had no idea what. There was a lot of secrecy about the work done in that branch of the Agency - depending on who you talked to, they were allegedly working on anything from time travel to dissecting alien corpses. Having seen some of the things they'd produced, there was little she would doubt. Whatever it was that she was going to see today, it was apparently classified enough that she'd been briefed in only the vaguest possible terms. To hear her superiors describe it, it sounded like she was going on an important mission, yet she wasn't even leaving the building. What could possibly be so important about me checking out their latest invention? The young agent thought to herself.

She stopped outside the door, which opened before she even had the chance to enter her access code. "Ah! Miss Harrington! Right on time!" Victoria found herself face-to-face with Trevor Burns, one of the top-ranking scientists in the department. She'd met him a few times before, and her general impression of him was not a positive one. It wasn't really that he was rude, or nasty, or anything she could easily pin down - there was just something about the boyish blond scientist that was generally off-putting. For starters, she wished he'd refer to her as Agent Harrington. She hadn't worked her way up to such a high position in record time to be denied her due title by some geeky eccentric, no matter how smart he was.

"How much have they told you?" Dr. Burns inquired as Victoria stepped inside.

"Just enough to have me confused," she responded. "They told me to meet you here today, but wouldn't tell me why. That I was supposed to treat this as an official mission, even though I wouldn't be going anywhere, but that I didn't need to bring anything, presumably because I'm not actually going anywhere, so I don't know why --"

"Well, sorry to interrupt," said Dr. Burns, "but you will be going somewhere...er, sort of. You're sort of right and wrong about not leaving the facility, as it turns out."

Victoria gave him a blank look. "What? What the hell does that mean? How can I be wrong and right? Am I going somewhere, or not?"

"Allow me to explain," said the doctor, escorting her into a room where some technicians were working on a rather intimidating machine. "This is the Quantum Transposition Machine. You're to be its first human test subject."

Victoria couldn't think of a response. She stared at the machine. Several bulky pieces were connected by wires and tubes to some display screens and to each other, but the focus of the whole thing was a chair in the middle. On the arms, legs, and seat, she could see a number of restraints, currently unfastened. Above the chair was something that looked like a hair dryer from a beauty salon, but much larger and substantially more sinister. Oh, God, what have I gotten myself into?

"Sorry to keep you in the dark," said Dr. Burns, "but we couldn't risk you knowing about it before you actually came down here."

"Quantum...Transportation Machine? Is that what you called it?" Victoria was trying to get a handle on things, but her training hadn't exactly prepared her for this. "Is it some sort of teleporter?"

"Almost! Very nearly, but not quite. And it's Transposition, not Transportation. You see, what it does is swap your identity with another person's anywhere in the world: It literally puts your head on someone else's shoulders."

"Literally?" Victoria was only growing more uncomfortable the more it was explained. "What do you mean, literally?"

"Literally as in literally," explained Dr. Burns, suddenly looking as if he was explaining something to an idiot. "We lower that beehive-looking part over your head, and zap it onto someone else's body."

He must have seen the look on her face. "Oh, no, don't worry!" he continued. "We've tested that part very thoroughly. It's all very quick, very seamless, no pain at all." To Victoria, he gave the impression of someone who didn't completely believe what they were saying.

"You've tested it? I thought you said I was the first human test!"

"First human test, yes! We've already tested it in computer simulations and on live monkeys, all of whom are in perfect health!"

"Though some of them are still on the wrong bodies," one of the other scientists added.

"Yes, thank you, Robinson!" Dr. Burns snapped angrily. "Really, I assure you, there's nothing to be afraid of. So, what do you say? Are you ready?"

Agent Harrington had probably never wanted to do anything less in her life, but she knew her duty as an agent.

"Ready," she said. "Don't make me regret this."

"So whose body will I end up with?" she asked as the attendants strapped her into the chair. "Is there another one of these machines somewhere else?"

It was just a regular day for the Wilkos Department Store. As usual, people of all kinds filled nearly all of it's aisles in search of various goods for their home or leisure. There was one person, however, who was here for no such purpose. He was an old man, appearing to be in his mid 60s. Although he was in very good shape and stood at over 6 feet, the man had a hunch in his back, making him appear to be much frailer and shorter. He walked with a cane that made a light tapping noise on the ground as it shook with his hands due to his growing arthritis.

"Excuse me, can I help you sir?" A young woman asked with a smile on her face.

The old man smiled back, looking the young woman over. Although her name-tag read 'Liz,' the old man was much more interested in the large mounds of flesh jutting out from her chest and pushing against her polo shirt, trying their best to break free from the constraining clothing. "Nein" he said, beginning in his native German before immediately switching to his rather weak English. "Sorry. My English not great. Not first language," he said in a heavy accent. "Assistance not necessary. I know what it is that I look for" he said, turning around and walking towards the men's restroom. Liz watched as the old man walked away. She thought about what it must be like to live to be so old and hoped that the man would be alright. Little did she know that that old man would soon be having a major impact on the entire store.

The old man grinned as he let himself into the handicap stall in the restroom. He then sat on the toilet and began to wait. His thoughts of the high percentage of beautiful women working in this store kept him awake. He chucked to himself as he thought over his plans. The man's name was Doctor Viktor Von Strasser. He was a top notch scientist that had formerly made his fortune in assisting various governments with rather unethical experiments. With now over 40 years of research in his field, Doctor Von Strasser was convinced that he would be able to change the world with his inventions. Of course, he thought that he would be able to change the world with his inventions. Just recently, Dr. Von Strasser was given two months to live. The radiation that he had worked with in his formative years as a scientist had taken it's toll on him, and the cancer that his body had was incurable. Of course, that didn't mean that Von Strasser was going to die. In fact, the news of Von Strasser's days coming to an end was a welcome development for the old scientist. With his life over, Von Strasser would no longer have to devote his work to others. He could now devote his time to what truly mattered. Himself.

Von Strasser had his next moves meticulously planned out. He would take over this strip mall and make it his new lab, where he would have a nearly unlimited range of unwilling subjects. He would set up his new lab in the basement of Wilkos and would continue his work in secret for as long as he wished. But in order to do that, Von Strasser first had to transcend the cancer that was ripping through his body. He would have to leave behind his current form in favor of a newer, younger model. Von Strasser knew that this would be the most important choice that he would make. His upgraded form would have to be someone with unlimited access to this area, but also someone who would be able to go for several hours at a time without being seen or needed. After watching this store for the past several days, Von Strasser knew whose form he would be stealing. He smiled evilly as he felt his aged dick hardening. Her job allowed her to spend long amounts of time in her office without being bothered or checked on and her position allowed her full reign on who she saw and when she saw them. Such access would be invaluable when it came to deciding on future subjects for the doctor.

He had followed her home and looked into her family life. Von Strasser was happy to see that Elizabeth was single and had a whole house all to herself. Liz laughed too, Liam was the type of employee that Liz was genuinely curious about why he was kept on the paycheck. Of course, the reason that Elizabeth kept him on was because his grandfather owned the strip mall and would have Elizabeth's head if he were to be fired, but both Elizabeth and Liz (as well as several other employees) were all guilty of fantasizing about how they would give him what was coming to him were he to no longer have that connection.

155331.content:
The participants play a normal poker hand but without betting. The one who wins the hand can swap anything he wants from the other players simply by saying the words "I want to swap ... with ... ". What you swap can be anything but it is not allowed to swap everything at once. For example you can swap heads with someone but you cannot swap the whole body in one hand.
When a swap takes place nobody except the ones playing at the moment will notice anything strange, reality will alter so that it was always that way.
The words for a swap have to be spoken within a time frame of two minutes. If not, a random swap between the winner and one of the losers takes place.
A swap which takes place cannot be reverted by the persons who participated in the swap for 48 hours. For example if Steven swaps hair with Jade neither Steven nor Jade can swap their rightful hair back before 48 hours have passed but it is possible for someone other to swap hair with the two of them.
It is also not possible to swap something back you had before within 48 hours. For example: Steven now has Jade's hair, Jade has Steven's. Kiran wins the hand and swaps hair with Steven so she gets Jade's hair. Steven now has Kiran's hair. It would be possible for Jade to swap hair with Steven so she would get Kiran's hair but it is not possible for her to swap hair with Kiran in order to get her own hair back.
Clothes adjust when someone swaps clothing or if some other physical aspect is swapped which would not fit with the clothes currently worn. For example if someone swaps height with some his clothes adjust to his sight so they fit just like the clothes before fit.
The swaps are not limited to physical appearance. It is possible to swap lives or personal information. It is possible as well to swap tastes, personality, connections to persons If someone quits playing the game while the others continue, the person will only notice the swaps prior quitting the game.
