Naomi turned around to see that Josh had arrived at her aisle and she seemed to think about it for a moment. "I guess I can make it. What day were you thinking about having it?" She asked her co-worker.

"Well, it looks like Carly and Zoe are going to be letting us borrow their salon for the night on Sunday." Josh answered her. He was hoping that she would come, as he always seemed to find Asian women more attractive for some reason. His wife always laughed at this and called it his 'Asian Persuasion'.

"Well on Sunday I won't be able to make it." Naomi replied to him. "My family and I are going to be out of town at my sister's dance recital. Perhaps I can join you on the next one." She apologized to him greatly.

"That's too bad." Josh said to her. "I was hoping to have some others to join us." Josh deliberately left out the information of Zoe's daughter being there. "I don't know when the next one will be but I think it will be on Wednesday or something. Suki will still be out of the country and we are going to try to get as many games in as we can before she returns.

"Yeah, you can count me in on the next game." Naomi said with her smiling face. "I think I can use a change of pace at my life and if what you're saying is true it will surely help with the monotony."

"I guess I will see you next time then." Josh said to her as he turned around to go back to his section.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Josh talks to Naomi again.

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
Sunday soon arrived and the group made their way over to Carly's salon for the net round of cards. "Are you guys as excited as I am for this next round?" Kiran asked the group as they continued to walk down the sidewalk. "I have a surprise for you guys too." She seemed really excited and Josh was a little worried.

"What's the surprise?" He wondered as he looked over to her. She seemed to be a little more cocky since the last game, when she gained his penis and Steven's height. 'I hope it's nothing too bad.' He thought to himself. He then looked over at the other players that would be joining them this round. Steven and Kiran were here from the last round. But Zoe had joined them for this round and it seemed interesting that she would be joining up with them. 'I wonder what Kiran said to her to get her to join up with us.'

"Okay we're here." Steven said as he opened the door to hear a door chime go off to signal that a customer had arrived. As they walked inside, the smell of nail varnish and polish remover was clearly evident in the air. Steven looked around and saw that it was mostly empty and then realized that they were supposed to close up in about 5 minutes time. "Hello?" He called out tentatively. He heard a slight rustle from the back and a young girl appeared from around the corner.

"Hello." The young girl responded as she saw the group consisting of 2 men and 2 women standing in the lobby. She turned around and announced to an unknown figure in the next room. "Ms. Carly, I think your friends are here."

"Thanks, Arissia." The voice responded back with a chipper voice. And within a minute she turned the corner. Carly was a blonde at about 5' 2" in height, but seemed to be 5' 5" with her heels on. She was dressed in a pair of skinny jeans and a tight shirt, which seemed to accentuate her bust.

"Not in your normal uniform." Steven replied to her as he looked around the salon.

"No, today was my day off and Zoe was kind enough to watch it for me." Carly said as she checked out the group of people that had entered her salon. "Zoe, luv, are you almost done?" Carly called to the back. "Our friends are here for the game."

"Oh, well, I will be out in a moment." Zoe called from the back. "Arissia, honey, how about you go to the lobby so that you won't be in the way."

"Ok, mummy." A cute voice called from the back and soon a little girl around the age of 7 with dark brown hair that seemed to cascade over her shoulders with her bangs cut, so that they would stay out of her eyes. She was wearing a pair of jeans and a pink blouse, with what appeared to be a well worn pair of mary-janes on her feet. Her eyes were like none that Josh had seen before. Their stormy gray color seemed to clash with the chipper personality of the little girl. "Hello, are you all here for the game?" She wondered to the group of visitors.

"Yes, Lil' one." Josh replied as he sat down in one of the chairs that appeared to be in the waiting room. Soon the others gathered around and Carly had brought a table to sit in the middle so that they could play on. To his surprise, Arissia sat down next to him. "Umm... Is she going to play too?" He asked Carly, who was busy rearranging some chairs around the table.

"I don't know." She replied as she called to the back once more. "Zoe, is Ari going to play too?"

"It's just poker right?" She wondered as she came from the back wearing her usual business attire, a pink tank top with their logo emblazoned upon it and a pair of tight pants.

"No, not really." Kiran answered back as she explained the rules to them.

"Mummy, I want to play. Daddy taught me how to play." Arissia asked her mother who seemed somewhat angry to the fact that her husband taught her daughter how to play poker.

"He did, did he?" She asked with what seemed like fire in her eyes. "I am going to really hurt him when I get home tonight" She steamed as Josh and Steven backed away slightly.

"Well, can I?" Arissia wondered back to her mom. "I won't get too upset." She exclaimed trying to assure her mother and the others that it would be okay. Kiran looked over to Josh and Steven, since they were the only males in the room. They seemed indifferent to the matter.

"I guess it will be okay." Kiran said to the girl, who was now beaming up at her. "Just don't get too upset over what happens okay?" Arissia nooded.

"So, Kiran, what was this surprise you wanted to tell us." Steven wondered as he took a seat in between Liz and Kiran.

"Oh, thanks for reminding me." Kiran said as she looked to the group. "Well, I was looking over the rules and the set that we played the other day is just one form of the rules." The group seemed to be a little perplexed at what was just said. "You know how we would play a round and the winner would utter the phrase?" The group nodded. "Well, this time we bet some of our attributes, like legs, arms, height, hair, and other stuff too."

"But what are they worth?" Josh wondered and instantly a holographic display appeared in front of each of them displaying the 'cost' of each part for the game.

Trait - Points
Small body parts (e.g hands, feet, lips... etc) - 1 Point
Small Possessions (e.g. jewelry, single books, single dvds) - 1 Point
One clothing article - 1 Point
Personal Infos (e.g. Age, name... etc) - 2 Point
Larger body parts (e.g. torso, legs, face... etc) - 2 Points
'Medium' Possessions (e.g. small personal library, DVD collections) - 2 points
Skills - 2 Points
Male/ Female body parts - 3 Points
Major possession (e.g. cars, houses, all of one article of clothing) - 3 Points
Gender - 3 Points
Personality changes - 4 Points
Whole Outfit - 4 Points
Life - 5 Points

"Well I guess we can do it like that." Steven said as he looked over at the others and all of whom seemed to be indifferent. "Well let's get this over with before it gets too late." Steven looked up at the clock which read 6:03 pm.

"Yeah, Arissia has school tomorrow and I want her in bed by 8:30." Zoe said as she looked at her daughter who seemed to be beaming, being allowed to play with the adults.

"Aww, I want to stay up later." Arissia complained as she wrapped her arms around her chest as if she was pouting.

"I've already told you this." Zoe said slightly exasperated. "When you get older, then you can stay up as late as you want, but right now, you're only seven and you need as much sleep as you can get."

"Fine." Arissia said as she looked at the others, hoping that they would help her out, but much to her dislike, that didn't happen.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Sunday night finally arrives.

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
Kiran was happy to deal out the cards, although it certainly would be different with a 7 year old playing with them and she decided that she wasn't going to take it easy on her until she was able to get what she wanted. As she finished dealing out the cards, she noticed that her hand was a good one, but didn't want the others to know. She looked down at the holographic display that the game gave everyone for guidance. "So I have to bet something worth 1 point." She mumbled to herself as she looked at her hand. "Oh, I will bet my hands." And as if on queue a holographic display of her hands were being shown in front of her. "Wow, didn't expect that." She exclaimed as she looked around and saw the dismay on everyone's face. "Carly, I do believe it's your turn."

Carly glanced back down at her cards to see what she could do. "Hmm... I guess I will bet my lovely lips and while I am at it, I think, my earrings too." She announced to the group and she looked over to see a lovely pair of feminine lips and her exact earrings were next to them. As if on instinct, she brought her hand up to her left ear and felt to see if they were missing, but much to her relief, she found they were still there.

"My turn." Zoe said cheerfully. "I will bet my job." With that a clipboard with 'Beautician' written upon it materialized in front of her.

"You trying to tell me something, luv?" Carly chuckled as she gestured towards the clipboard.

"No, not at all." Zoe quickly said. "It's the first thing that came to mind actually." She grinned as she turned to her daughter. "Arissia, it's your turn, sweetheart."

She nodded gleefully. "I think I will bet my pretty hair." As like the others, her hairstyle appeared in front of her. "That is so cool, Mum." She chuckled as she pointed to her bet that was in front of her and Zoe nodded to her appreciatively. "Mr. Josh, I think it's your turn."

"Thanks, Lil' one." Josh commented, as he too looked at his cards. From the looks of it, he had a good hand and could win if the bets didn't get too high. "I think I will bet my gaming system. Liz, I do believe it's your go."

She nodded as she too looked at her hand and thought about what would be a proper bet. "Hmm... So I need 2 points to stay in." Kiran nodded as she looked at her hand. "Well in that case, I think I will bet my voice and my ample bosom." The others laughed at this comment as her huge breasts took center stage on the table. "Well at least the game censored the nipples." The group nodded as they smiled.

Steven seemed to smile more than the others as he looked at his hand. "I think I will bet my job and I guess my gender won't be too bad." He announced as he looked over to Josh who seemed to quiver slightly at the comment.

"Well, I guess I will bet my groin." Kiran announced with a bit of pride. Josh knew who would be the recipient of that prize if she won.

"Mum, whats a groin?" Arissia wondered to Zoe.

"Oh, she bet her 'gina'." Zoe said to her trying to get her to understand.

"Oh, I think it will be funny if one of the boys get it." Arissia chuckled to her mum and Zoe couldn't help but chuckle along with her. Carly, Steven, and Zoe folded their hands with this latest bet. "I guess I will too. Daddy showed me the winning hands and I don't have anything too good." She said as she also lay her hand down.

Josh looked to see what he had. "I think I will bet my Job experience. I think that will help me out with getting my job done a little bit better." He chuckled as he looked to Liz to see if she would join in.

"I think I will bet my legs." She announced to the group as her legs appeared right beside her chest and her voice.

"My go." Kiran said proudly. "I think I will bet my gender too." Josh then threw down his cards and folded after hearing this. "Liz looks like it's between you and me. Let's see what you got."

Liz smiled broadly as she lay down her hand "I have 3 of a kind" She showed the group her hand as she lay down a trio of 9's.

"That indeed is a good hand." Kiran said smiling. "But it won't beat my straight." As if on queue all the traits found their way over to Kiran who in turn squealed with delight at having won. As they migrated towards her, a figure for each player popped up in front of Kiran with their name displayed on the front. "That was interesting." Kiran muttered to herself as she thought about what she wanted to give each player. "Well, I know Josh was expecting this when I bet it, so I will give Josh my groin and my gender too." Josh didn't need to feel himself like last time, he knew that he was now a woman in his pants and on paper with her gender.

"So Mr. Josh now has a 'gina' too." Arissia asked Kiran who nodded to her. She then giggled at the fact.

"You know what Josh?" Kiran asked. "You looked cute with long hair last time so I think you should try it again." She then dragged Arissia's hair over to his character and he felt his hair grow out and it reached his mid back, much like hers had been seconds earlier. He then glanced over to Arissia, who now sported his shorter hair style, but it appeared that she didn't mind it too much. "To take care of it, I think you should have Zoe's job and her experience. Steven, I think you should have Liz's job and legs, but I think I will take her chest." With Kiran's smaller stature, Liz's chest seemed huge on her. I will take Carly's hands because I've always liked the the fact they always look nice. Steven, since you have Liz's job, I think you should have her voice too and take Carly's lips and earrings."

"Why did you do that?" Steven asked, with Liz's voice emanating from Carly's painted lips and he reached up to his ears and felt that they indeed were now pierced.

"I thought it would be funny. But you sound like a girl, so I think your gender will go to her too." Kiran said with a smile. "Oh and Josh, I think your gaming system will go to Arissia, since you have her hair. Well that's all for this round." Everyone looked at themselves, among other changes, Josh had a beautician's job and knowledge, Steven had some nice lips and legs, and Kiran got free breast 'implants'.

"This is too weird." Josh said as he got up and went over to one of the work stations to grab a couple of hair ties. He noticed a mirror on one of the work stations and he looked in to see that his hair was now longer with short bangs, much like you would find on a primary student and, if almost on instinct, he started to braid his new hair into 2 perfect braided pig tails to rest on his shoulders.

"Wow, that's the braid that Mummy always does for me before bed." Arissia smiled to Josh as he made his way back over to the group.

"I was wondering why it came to me so easily and try to go easy with my gaming system." Josh said to her smiling.

"Oh alright, but I don't think I will play it." Arissia exclaimed to him.

"I think you should at least try it." Josh told her with a smile. "You will never know, you might enjoy it. I know my wife certainly does." He chuckled as he thought about his wife playing some of her games, cursing at he opponents as she tried to kill them.

"You mean I can try it out? She plays video games too?" Arissia asked with a look of wonder on her face. "She sounds like a cool person." With that said, Arissia had an idea go through her head.

"Oh yes, she loves it and yes she is. Well, let's get the next round going." The other nodded as Carly gathered up the cards and started to deal them out.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Hand 1 (A)

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
As Carly dealt out the cards, Kiran was on cloud 9 with her new acquisition. Just thinking about it, caused it to stir slightly within her knickers. She looked at the cards in her hand and noticed that her hand wasn't as good as last time, but decided to see what she could out of it. "Carly, I think it's your turn to lead us off." Kiran said to Steven's blonde friend, who was nice enough to let them borrow her shop for the night.

Carly looked around to the slightly changed group, then down at her own hand. "Well, one point to lead off." Carly muttered to herself. "I think I will bet my feet." Soon, a pair of feet, which included her french-tipped pedicure appeared. She looked over to Zoe who was looking somewhat depressed. "What's wrong, luv.?" She asked her former co-worker.

"Well, it's just that I went to school for this, but now I have other knowledge in my head." She replied back to her friend. "Before I had the information about manicures, haircuts, and waxing, but now it's filled with useless knowledge of some computer programs and Earth Sciences."

"It's not that useless and I do want it back after this is over." Josh said to her smiling.

"Oh, you can be sure that I will return it, because I want my knowledge and job back." Zoe said to him. "Now, let's see, I will bet my hands." Her hands soon appeared in front of her to join Carly's feet. "Arissia, sweetie, it's your turn now." She then grew near her and whispered, "Try not to bet too much, okay?" Arissia looked at her with her wide grey eyes and nodded.

She then looked down at the cards in her hand and gave a toothy smile. "I am going to bet my age, I don't like having to go to bed so early." She glanced at the table and noticed that it took her bet and a small cake appeared with 7 candles that were ablaze on it. "Mr. Josh, it's your turn again. Wait, it's Ms. Josh now." She said giggling as she remembered that he was now a girl thanks to Kiran.

Josh's brow furrowed slightly as he heard this. "I am going to try and get my job back, so I am going to bet Zoe's job that I just got." Josh announced as a clipboard appeared and like before, the word 'Beautician' was written on it.

"What's wrong, Josh?" Carly said to him with a smile on her face. "Not wanting to work with me?"

"Nothing like that really." Josh replied back to her. "It's just that I enjoy the people that I work with." He lied to her not wanting to really tell her that he didn't want to work doing manicures and stuff for the next several days. "Liz are you going to join us?"

Liz looked at her cards and announced. "I think that I will bet my work knowledge, that way Steven will have a better knowledge of what to do." In front of her appeared several work books with different positions in the store, 'Supervisor' 'Cashier' 'Stocking', among others were with them.

"Hmm..." Steven said to himself with Liz's voice coming out of Carly's lips. "It's not getting too bad right now, so I think I will bet my arms." His fairly muscular arms could be found next to the others' bets. "Besides, if I am the supervisor now, I don't think that I will have to lift too much stuff." He smiled slightly when he looked over to Liz, who seemed to frown with a slight disdain.

"Is that what you think I do?" She replied to him. "Stand around bossing others around. I think this will do you some good to know what it's like. Besides, Kiran, I think it's your turn."

Kiran not wanting to get into the argument that they seemed to be having. "I think I will bet my musculature, I want to know how it is to feel strong." Carly and Zoe looked at the cards in their hand and decided not to get too far into it and promptly folded.

"Arissia, sweetie, do you want to fold too?" Zoe looked over to her daughter who seemed to be smiling.

"No, mummy." She replied back. "I think I can win this, so I am going to bet all my pretty clothes." Soon she found a rolling rack with all sorts of dresses, pants, shirts, and shoes on it.

"Ok, but be careful, I don't want you to get too disappointed." Zoe asked her daughter.

"I won't." She said with her sweet smile gracing her face. "Ms. Josh, are you going to stay in?" She wondered as she saw the frown on his face with her calling him Miss again.

"Ha Ha. You seem to be getting a lot fun out of that." He faked his laugh. "I think I will call with my, I guess my height." He announced as a tape measure with 5' 10" measured out. The others, Steven, Liz, and Kiran folded, not really wanting to get too far into it. "So you're not going to fold Arissia?"

She took a small moment to look at her cards and decided. "No, I think I have a good enough hand." She replied to him and Zoe, wondering what she had looked over her shoulder and smiled. "What do you have?"

"Yeah, Josh. Show her what you got." Zoe chided with a grin.

"Okay, I have a straight. 5 through 9." Josh said with a satisfying grin on his face.

"That's not bad." Zoe said with her fingers near her mouth with an attempt to look like she was deep in thought. "Show him your hand sweetie." She instructed her daughter who was giddy with excitement.

"Okay, but will you help me with deciding who will get what?" She asked her mother who nodded.

"Yes, but it's your win. I will help you if you want me to." Zoe replied back appreciatively.

Arissia beamed up at her and nodded. "Okay, I have all hearts." Josh's heart fell as he saw that her hand beat his. "First I think I will take my mummy's job from you Josh and Kiran I will give you Mr. Steven's muscles."

"I lost?!? So what does that mean for me?" Josh wondered to Zoe and the others.

"Well, it's a job and her job is a primary school student." Zoe replied back to Josh who didn't seem to like what he heard.

"So you mean, that I now go to her classes and school?" Josh exclaimed as he took out his wallet and noticed that all he had was a driver's license and nothing else, no money, debit cards, or credit cards. All he could find was a photo of him with his hair done up in pigtails, almost like a school photo.

"Well, what did you find?" Zoe wondered.

"I go to her school now." Josh pouted as she showed the picture to Zoe.

"Awe, you look just like Arissia did when she got her's done." Zoe said trying to stifle a laugh. "The only thing that's different is the clothes are different."

"Yay!" Arissia yelled with glee. "I get to have my Mummy's job! Mummy, I will take your hands, but I think you can have Ms. Carly's feet and Mr. Steven's arms." Zoe looked down at her hands and instantly noticed that they were smaller in comparison to her body and attached to Steven's not-so-muscular arms, surely didn't seem to help with the size difference. "Steven, since you have Ms. Liz's job, I think you can have her work experi... This thing." She said as she brought Liz's work knowledge over to Steven's character. "Mummy what should I do with the height, age, and clothes?"

Zoe sat there for a moment and replied to her daughter. "Well think about it for a moment. You're a beautician now right?" Arissia nodded at her question. "And Josh is in your classes."

"No no no, not that." Josh started to say waving his hands trying to send a message.

"Oh. I think I get it." She replied as she slid her age over to Josh's character and Josh pulled out his wallet once more and noticed that he no longer had his driver's license, as he wouldn't need it for 10 more years. "You think I should give him the other stuff too?" Arissia wondered to her mum.

"It's up to you, Ari." Zoe commented using her daughter's pet name.

"Well, if he's going to go to my classes, I think he will need to be smaller. Don't you guys think?" Arissia asked the others.

"Oh yes." Kiran said nodding her head and smiling over to Josh, who seemed to be waving his hands frantically but after hearing what she said gave her an obscene gesture while Arissia wasn't looking. Kiran saw his gesture and frowned. "Actually Arissia, I think he should have your pretty clothes too, if he's going to go to your school. What do you think?"

Arissia quickly turned to Josh and saw him bring his hands down suddenly. "I guess you're right. I mean, he is a girl now because of you." She thought about this for a quick moment and brought over her height to him and clothing as well. Soon she felt weird as her height increased from her usual 4' 1" size to Josh's 5' 10" frame. She also felt a shift as her clothing shifted to Josh's work attire, black pants, red shirt, and trainers. She then looked over to Josh to see that he was now wearing her pants, blouse, and mary-jane shoes. He also shrunk down in size too.

"You look too cute." Carly said giggling as she saw him petting himself to assess the damage that occurred.

"Yeah yeah. Laugh it up." Josh said to her. "I feel weird."

"No, you look cute with your hair done up like that." Kiran said to him. "But you're a little too hairy for a primary student though. And I wonder what your wife will think about the entire thing? Is she still your wife?" She wondered to the group.

"Well we can always fix that in the coming rounds." Zoe suggested as she looked over her now masculine arms and her smaller hands thanks to Steven and Arissia. She looked over to Kiran, who seemed to be in heaven with her new found strength as she flexed in a mirror. "I guess we should start the next round." Zoe suggested as she picked up the cards and got ready to deal them out for the third round.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Hand 2 (A)

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
As Zoe started to hand out the cards, she noticed Josh sitting there kicking his legs back and forth freely under the table. "Are you doing okay over there Josh?" She wondered as she started to notice that he started to look somewhat like her daughter. With her hair style, height and clothing.

"Yeah, it's just a little weird, is all." Josh said as he continued to swing his legs. "I mean, I haven't been this small in quite some time and these clothes." He let out a big sigh.

"Well if you want to sit out the next round we understand." Kiran said with an approving smile.

"No, it's alright. We only have a couple more rounds left anyhow." Josh replied back to her. He tried to sit up a little bit higher in order to see the table a little better, but failed in his attempt. Carly noticed him doing this and offered to get him some books to sit on, which he painfully agreed.

"Alright, so it's my turn to go first right?" Zoe asked the group who all nodded. "Well in that case, I think I will lead off with my eyes." Just then a pair of eyes, complete with eyelashes sat in front of her.

Arissia looked at her cards for a moment and without making a face or anything said. "I will bet my job experience." As soon as it was announced, a couple of school books appeared in front of her and Josh knew instantly who was going to be the recipient of that. "Mr. Josh, it's your turn." She said looking down at him and smiling. She definitely looked happier and appeared more confident with her new found height.

"I can't really do anything with these cards, so I am going to fold." Josh announced as he lay his cards down. Much to the disappointment of Arissia and the others.

"Getting too much for you Josh?" Carly wondered as she looked over to him.

"No, just didn't have anything." Josh said to her with as much assertiveness that he could muster, which was hard given his new height.

"Okay." Liz said. "We trust you. Now, I see Kiran is having a lot of fun over there, so I want to put up my groin." Just then a picture of her groin popped up with a censor bar over her vagina and Kiran hoped that it wouldn't be like the last game with Jade taking it from her.

"Hmm... I think I will bet my interests and my favorite game." Steven announced as a list appeared and his favorite video game 'Mass Effect 2' right next to it.

"Hmm... I think I will join Josh and fold as well." Kiran announced as she followed Josh's example and folded her hand.

"Not much going on tonight." Carly chuckled as she looked around. "I think I will bet my arms and my age." A pair of feminine looking arms and, like before with Arissia, a cake with the number 33 appeared on it. Zoe, not really liking where this was going, decided to follow Josh and Kiran's move and folded too.

"I think I will bet what I am to my Mummy." Arissia said as she looked to see if it took it. "Why didn't it do anything?" she wondered to the group.

"Do you really want to bet that sweetie?" Zoe said as she caressed her new shorter hairstyle. Arissia nodded to her and Zoe replied back to her. "Okay, you want relationship status then."

"Oh, I will bet my relationship status and I guess my hair too." Arissia announced with great joy. Just then another list appeared with her shorter hairstyle appeared. Liz, seeing the new bets, decided to fold. "Ms. Carly, are you going to fold too?"

"No, not really." Carly announced with a smile. "I will call with my voice. What do you have?" Arissia lay down her cards showing that she had 2 pairs, J's and 9's. "Not too bad, but I don't think it will beat my 3 of a kind." She seemed happy that she won a round and thought about who would get what. "Hmm... Sorry Josh, but if Arissia is going to be working in my salon, then she will need to know what she is doing." Carly then brought over the 'lack of' work knowledge' that Arissia had and deposited it over to Josh. Almost instantly, it seemed, Josh didn't know what it felt like to have a job, all the knowledge that he had received from Zoe was now gone. The inverse happened to Arissia, who now knew how to do everything her Mum knew. "And Arissia, I will give you Kiran's hairstyle, since she is now considered a man." Kiran felt her head and felt her start to recede back inside as Josh's hairstyle took over. Arissia was happy to have 'girl's' hair again, that she promptly went over to one of the work stations, much like Josh had done earlier, but this time she adopted a more adult hairstyle.

Kiran looked over to Arissia and had to comment on her hairstyle. "You know what that actually looks good." She complimented the former younger player. "Zoe, you sure know how to do some nice styling."

"Thanks, Kiran." Zoe replied back to her. "You should come by when we swap back and I will see what I can do with it." Carly liked hearing the compliments coming about her employee's skills.

"Zoe, I don't want you to hate me about these next 2 swaps. Oh and Josh, I am about to solve your problem with your wife." Carly said with a devious smile.

"What?" Josh replied back to her. He was lost in his thoughts with the lack of knowledge he now had, but soon realized what she was talking about. "Geez, did I do something wrong to deserve this punishment?"

"No, but you can't be married as a 7 year old." Zoe said to him. "Besides, I will still be worrying about Arissia, but I can always come and pick her up."

"So you're not too upset about me making him your daughter?" She asked.

Zoe shook her head. "No, not at all and I think we will have fun." She winked over to Josh. "Besides I think his blue eyes will look great on me." She chuckled to her friend and former boss.

Josh sighed and resigned to his inevitable fate as he saw Carly bring Arissia's relationships over to his avatar. He then knew that his wife was now Arissia's and Zoe as now his Mum. He then felt his eyes shift slightly and he had to blink. When he opened up his eyes, he glanced over to Zoe and noticed that his eyes were now gracing her face. "You know what Zoe. I have to admit, my eyes do look good on you."

"Sorry, but it's Mummy, now sweetie." Zoe said with a grin and a wink. "But, thank you I liked them too."

"You can't be serious." Josh responded.

"Don't take that tone with me young lady." Zoe said with a grin, which made the others chuckle. "What are you going to do with the other things, Carly?" Carly looked down at her voice and arms and decided that she wanted to keep those for the time being. "I know Josh has a voice slightly too deep for a young 'girl', but I am going to keep my voice and arms for right now. So you can rest easy about that, Josh." She looked over at Josh, who seemed relieved that he was out of the woods for the rest of the hand. "Steven, I think it's time for you to branch out a little bit more." Steven looked dumbstruck as Carly picked up his 'interests' and decided who to give it to.

'Just don't give it to Arissia.' He thought to himself as he held his breath.

"I think Kiran will like to know what it's like to have male interests." She said as she brought over his interests and favorite game over to Kiran, who seemed interested with her new interests with video games. Steven, however, wanted to check out a sale at a shop nearby and the new lotion shop that opened at the mall nearby. "Steven, luv, you can't be a woman, without giving up your penis. So, I think Liz will enjoy it as much as Kiran is right now."

Liz felt weird as she felt something start to push out between her legs and had to adjust herself to accommodate it better in her pants. "Wow, that feels nice." She couldn't help but say as she rubbed it to get an idea of it's size and felt it get hard. 'I think I am going to enjoy this.' She thought to herself. 'I wonder if Eric will enjoy it.' The thought of it seemed to make her harder.

"Oh and for my age, I think I would love to be younger." Carly responded to the group, which seemed perk Josh up a little. "Not that young, Josh." With that said, it seemed to deflate Josh's ambition to join the older ones. "But Kiran, I think I would love to try being 17 again, do you mind?" Kiran shook her head and Carly brought her age over to Kiran's avatar and deposited it. "Well, I think that's everything. How does everyone feel?

"Small and insignificant." Josh was quick to reply as he knew that nobody would want what he he had now.

"Awe, sweetie it's okay." Zoe said to him with a grin on her face as she saw him wince at the word 'sweetie'. "Do you think you will get anything that you want?" She inquired over to Josh.

"I don't really know, but I think I will need to start thinking about filling in the gaps about who I will be for the time I am like this." Josh said as he started to think about some of the traits he would give up.

"Oh really like what?" Kiran wondered.

"I think you will have to wait and find out when I bet them, won't you?" He replied back which caused her to glower at him for a bit.

"Okay you two." Zoe responded to them. "Arissia, do you want me to shuffle the cards for you?" She nodded and Zoe proceeded to shuffle them and gave them back to her to hand out to the group for the next hand.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Hand 3 (A)

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
Arissia dealt out the cards and didn't really like what she saw. The last couple of hands that she was dealt seemed to be much better than what she had now. "Is everyone enjoying themselves?" Kiran asked the group, who all seemed surprised by the gesture.

Josh looked at his cards and didn't look up as the question was asked. "I have to say that I'm enjoying it." Zoe answered with a smile. "But I wish I still worked at the salon though."

"You might still work after the night is over with." Carly replied back to her with a small twinkle in her eye. "Well, Arissia, I do believe it's your turn to lead us off."

Arissia nodded. "I think I will bet my voice. I don't think it fits a lady in her 30's." With her bet placed, a piece of paper with what looked like a musical note on it was placed in front of her. Josh knew he was going to be the one to get that even though he really didn't want it. "Mr. Josh it's your turn."

Josh looked over to Arissia, who seemed pleased with her new height and job. "Tell me Arissia, are you liking the stuff you got from me?" He asked her.

"Yes, very much, I'm happy that I get to stay up late." She answered.

"Well, I guess I will bet my physical age then, so you will know what it's like to be older." Josh said as a figure morphing from baby to child then to adult sat in front of him.

"What exactly is that?" Zoe wondered to Josh.

"I don't know exactly, but I think if I give it to Arissia, I will get all her energy." Josh responded back. "And while I am at it, I think I will bet my favorite color too." A color wheel appeared next to the figure from his bet just seconds before, it was pointing to blue. "Liz, it's your turn."

Liz contemplated on what exactly she wanted to bet. "Hmm... If Steven thinks it's easy to be me, then I think I will bet my relationships too." A list appeared in front of her with all the relationships in her life, Mother, Father, Husband, etc.

"I never said it would be easy to be you." Steven replied defensively. "I was just thinking out loud is all. Well, since it doesn't appeal to me much anymore, I think I am going to bet my gaming skills and the earrings that I got from Carly." Much to the astonishment of the others, Steven's gaming skills manifested as a video game magazine with the earrings he got from Carly sitting right next to it.

Kiran looked over her cards once more and frowned. "I don't have anything, so I am going to fold for this round." She laid her cards down and looked over to Carly. "Did you get anything decent this round?"

"I think so." Carly responded back to her. "I think I will do Zoe a favor and bet my job and work experience." Just like several times before, several books and a clipboard with 'Beautician' written on it. She then looked over to Zoe, who was speechless. "That way you can be with your daughter and work together. I don't mind taking a break."

"You will do that for me?" Zoe asked her friend and former employer.

"Yeah, it will be nice to get away and I can talk to Steven and Liz." Carly replied back to her. "Besides, it's your turn."

"I don't have anything, so I am going to fold too." Zoe said as she laid down her cards. "What about you, Arissia?"

Just like her Mum, Arissia looked at her cards. "I don't think I have anything either, mummy." She then proceeded to lay her cards down too. Josh quickly followed suit and folded too.

"I don't know about you guys, but I'm going to keep going." Liz said with a smile. "I will add my height and my name too." Added to her relationship, a tape measure with the measurement of 5' 4" and a paper 'Hi, My Name is...' next to it. This seemed too much for the others and Kiran, Steven, and Carly all folded their hands too.

"Looks like you won this one." Josh said with a smile.

"Yeah and I am happy for it too." Liz responded back to him. "Now, let's see what we have here." Liz looked over the spoils that migrated over to her when everyone folded their hands, leaving her the winner of the hand. "Steven, I think I will take your height." She brought her height over to Steven and noticed him fidgeting slightly. "It won't be too bad." She said as she gave him her height. Almost instantly she started to grow 8" to Steven's former height of 6' tall. "I think I am going to like this." Liz responded as she looked at how much smaller everything seemed to be compared to before. "I think I'm taller than Eric now. Speaking of Eric, that gives me an idea" She then picked up her relationship and dragged it over to Steven. "Let's see if you think it's easy to live with him."

"I never said it would be easy." Steven said with Liz's voice.

"Well, it's too late now." Liz responded to him. "Hmm... I think Kiran will enjoy your gaming skills, but I think you will keep Carly's earrings." Before, Steven had a lot of knowledge of all the different games on the market and how to beat them all, but now they all escaped him. He'd heard of Mario, but didn't really know it worked or how the game played out. "Zoe, I think I will give you Carly's job and work experience, since she gave her consent for you to have it." She brought over Carly job and work experience over to Zoe who was now the owner and lead beautician of the salon.

"So does that mean that I work with my Mummy?" Arissia wondered as she looked over to Liz. Liz nodded and Arissia was clearly happy. "Yay, we are going to have so much fun."

"You know what, I think your voice does need to be more adult." Liz said as she brought Arissia's voice over to Kiran and deposited it. "Hmm... Josh, I will give your bet of physical age to Arissia." Liz watched in wonder as his skin firmed up slightly, but what really shocked her was when he spoke.

"Thank..." Josh started to say, but stopped suddenly. His voice was higher and it seemed more girly. "What happened?" he asked as he brought his hands up to his throat.

"Um... I think since you have my gender, the game made it seem that you're now a young girl." Kiran hypothesized.

"I don't believe this." Josh said as he put his smaller hands up to his face.

Liz seemed to interrupt his despair with the next bet. "Josh, I think I will give your favorite color over to Kiran." Josh saw her drop it over to Kiran and thought about his favorite color. "So what is it now?" She wondered as she looked at Josh.

He thought hard about his favorite color and it came to pink. "Really Kiran, you couldn't think outside the box for a different color?" He practically yelled, which seemed shrill with his higher voice. This caused the group to laugh.

"Why what is it now?" Carly asked as she tried to keep from laughing.

Josh blushed slightly as he lightly muttered his favorite color. "Pink."

The group looked at him and Zoe was the one to speak up. "I'm sorry, we didn't hear that?" She said with her hand near her ear to emphasize the point.

"Pink. My new favorite color is Pink." Josh says as he sulked slightly in his chair.

"That's not too bad." Zoe answered. "Besides, since you will be staying in Arissisa's room, you will enjoy it. It's everywhere in there." Hearing this, Josh seemed to have a slight giddiness inside him.

"I think I need to use the restroom." Josh replied as he got up. "So wait for me and I don't want you guys playing a round without me." Josh proceeded to the bathroom and sat down on the toilet and emptied his bladder. Not wanting to hear it when he walked out, he wiped to make sure it was all dry before he pulled up his new pants. He also took this opportunity to look in the mirror. He was amazed at what he now looked like. His eyes were no longer blue, but instead a hazel color and it looked like he was younger. Well, this was expected because of the physical age he got from Arissia. "This is definitely going to be an interesting 2 days." Josh said to himself as he made his way back to the table.

"Welcome back." Kiran said. "It does look like we have enough time for one more hand." Kiran said as she gave the cards to Josh so that he could give them a good shuffle and dealt them out.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Hand 4 (A)

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
Josh started to deal out the cards and actually had a chance to get a look at Arissia and what the physical age swap did to her. She had slight crows feet appearing under her eyes and her chest seemed to be bigger, it looked like a B-Cup. It was as if she actually went through puberty without the hardships that would normally come with it. He then looked at his cards. "Josh, I know this is the last hand of the night, but we need to get it going." Zoe said to him. "I don't want you to be cranky tomorrow."

"I won't be cranky." He replied defendingly while crossing his arms across his chest. "Fine, I will bet my name." Just like with Liz, a paper name tag with 'Hi! My Name is...' appeared in front of him. "There, now we can get it going." Josh said over to Zoe.

Liz looked down at her hand, not wanting to get involved with what was brewing with Josh and Zoe. "I think I will bet my hair." She proudly announced as her shoulder length, dirty blonde hair appeared in front of her.

Steven looked at his cards. "I think I will bet my computer." He said somewhat willingly. He was willing, due to his new interests from Kiran. He now seemed more interested in some games on his phone more than on a console or computer. 'I won't miss them too much.' Steven thought to himself. 'Besides, I have some nice sales to check out, that will keep me busy.' "Um, Kiran I think it's your turn."

She nodded and double checked her cards. "I don't think I have the winning combination." Kiran said as she folded and put her cards down.

"I think I will bet my chest." Carly announced to the group. Her impressive C-cups were now on full display, with the nipples censored out. "So Zoe, do you have anything to add?"

Zoe was still at a loss with what had transpired the last round. The last thing she expected to happen was Carly to give up her job and knowledge for her. It was almost enough to make her tear up, but not quite, she had to keep her makeup in check after all. "I think I will bet my taste in books." She said to the group as an array of romance books appeared in front of her.

"I thought you gave those up, luv?" Carly replied slyly as she looked at her bet in front of her.

"Oh, I did... mostly." Zoe responded. "But, I recently started it up again. Arissia, I do believe it's your turn."

"Ok, mum." Arissia replied back to her. "I think I will fold too. I don't have anything either. Josh?"

"Hmm...?" Josh looked up at Arissia. "Oh, I think I bet my interests too."

"Have you resigned to your fate?" Steven said wryly as he looked over at Josh who didn't really miss a beat in responding.

"No, not really." Josh responded. "I just wanted try something new for the next couple of days?"

"Wait." Arissia said abruptly. "I thought this was permanent." The look on Josh's face was priceless.

"No no no." Josh practically yelled while waving his arms. "As long as we have all the cards, we can swap back, thankfully."

"Awe, don't you like being so little?" Zoe wondered over to her new daughter.

"Let's just say, I like being tall. I can live being a woman or everyone thinking I am a woman, but being so small is what I'm not liking." Josh responded back to her.

Liz finally spoke up. "Can we finish the last round?" Everyone nodded and Liz responded by placing her bet. "I think I will bet my earrings." Her small studs appeared right next to her hair. "And while I am at it I think I will bet my life too." Just then, what looked like her soul appeared right in front. Everyone seemed overwhelmed by the amount they would have to put in to keep us and promptly folded. "And that is how you do it." She replied to the group. "I think I am going to keep my life and earrings." She brought those traits back over to her avatar and placed them there. "Steven, do you have a suggestion on who to give your computer to?"

Steven looked confused for a moment and didn't know. "Not really, but I think Kiran will like it more than I will right now." He motioned over to Kiran, who looked like she wanted it. Not really wanting it, but it seemed needing it. She nodded, as if to say, that she wanted it.

"Okay, then." Liz said as she brought it over to her and she seemed ecstatic over it. "Now we have the chest of Carly, and Steven, I think you need them." She brought over the forms and deposited onto Steven. He looked down and watched his chest slowly inflate until his chest now resembled Carly's natural, busty C-cups. Liz looked at Steven for a moment and brought her fingers up to her mouth. "I'm missing something." She looked at him for a moment. "I know, I think you need a nice hairdo." She brought over her hairstyle and dropped it on Steven's character. As she did this, she felt her hair recede back into her head until it reached Steven's more closely cropped hairstyle. She glanced over to Steven and noticed him trying to keep it out of his face. It appeared that when her hair receded back into her head it dropped her scrunchie that she was using on the ground. She bent over and picked it up and tossed it over to Zoe. "Would you mind helping him out with his new hair while I finish up handing out the bets?"

"Not at all, luv." Zoe replied back curtly. She made her way over and grabbed a hair tie from one of the drawers and started to work on Steven's hair.

"Okay, so Zoe, I am going to give your book preferences to Carly." Liz said as brought it over to Carly's character and dropped it off.

"Thanks, I guess." Carly replied back to her. "I guess I will need something to occupy my time in the tea room." Zoe and Steven chuckled at this while Zoe finished his hair.

"As I said, I think I will keep my earrings." Liz said as she brought it back over to her character. "Now, let's see here." She looked at the last 2 items left on the table. "Josh's name and interests. I am going to be nice and let you pick your name." She looked over at Josh. "So who will it be?" Josh looked around the table.

"I pick Carly." Josh replied to her. "She has my work experience and job, so it's only fitting that I take her name." He chuckled at the thought of being called another name besides his own. He watched as Liz brought over his name over to Carly and dropped it off. "So what about the interests?"

"Yeah, about that." Liz said as she looked down at the table. "Well, we can't have Arissia freaking out when a lady who looks like a princess walks in or get excited over some small thing."

"Fine." Josh said as he resigned to his fate, much like Steven referred to earlier. "I understand, I mean, this is a learning experience, right."

"Yeah, I'm glad you're not throwing a fit." Liz responded to him. She brought over his interests over to Arissia and dropped them off. "Well that's it for tonight. Arissia, do you mind gathering up all the cards and putting them back in the box?"

"No, not at all." She replied as she saw all the others go to the mirrors to check to see how they changed. 'Now's my chance. Josh said that as long as all the cards are here, we can change back. So all I have to do is take one of the cards and hide it somewhere and we can change back when I want.' She thought to herself as she picked up one of the cards and quietly slipped it in her back pocket. She then placed the remainder of the cards back in the box and handed it back to Kiran. "Here you go Kiran."

"Thanks, Arissia." She thanked as she grabbed the box from her and put it in the bag that she brought with her. "So, Suki will be back in 5 days. So I think we can stay this way for let's say 4 days?" Majority of the group approved, but Josh and Steven were the only ones that didn't want to do it that long.

"So I have class tomorrow?" Josh wondered over to Zoe.

She nodded, "So we need to get a move on and get you home so that you can get a bath and go to bed."

Arissia was checking out her new reflection when she felt a buzzing coming from her pocket. She reached in and found her new mobile, which originally belonged to Josh. "Who is Marcie?" She wondered to the group.

Josh chuckled slightly as he was gathering up his items. "She is your new wife and it looks like she is outside waiting for you." He pointed out the window to a small SUV with a lady waving to Arissia.

"Well, I guess I gotta go." She said to the group. "I guess I will see you tomorrow, mummy?"

"Sweetie, until we change back I need you to call me Zoe, okay?" She inquired to her. She nodded in agreement as she waved good bye to the group and made her way out the door and into the car with the extra card still in her back pocket. "As for you." She turned to Josh. "You will need to call my mummy until we change back." Josh begrudgingly nodded. "Alright everyone, I need to lock up for the night." She announced as she looked to the group. All seemed to understand as they gathered up their belongings and made their way to the door and their new lives for the next several days.

1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: recap of the swaps

choices: Checking in with some of the others.
Josh checks out his new room and interests.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
As Zoe locked the shop up for the night, Josh waved everyone good bye. They all seemed to be interested with the traits that they gained from each other. Steven was engrossed in his phone with some app that he found, Kiran was interested in getting home to see what she could play for the night, and LIz made her way to Steven's apartment to have some time to herself. "Alright, Josh." Zoe announced from behind him. "All locked up and now we can head out." She leaned down slightly and out of instinct, grabbed his hand to help guide him to ensure he didn't get too far away from her. "The car should be right over here." She pointed to a nearby parking lot, which a small compact car was parked. "Here we are." She clicked the button on the keys to unlock it and opened the back door for Josh to get in.

"I have to sit on that?" Josh wondered as he looked at the princess booster seat that sat in the back seat.

"Yes, sweetie." Zoe replied as she easily picked Josh up and put him in the seat. And what seemed like a few seconds, he was buckled in and ready to go. As she got in the driver's seat she sighed.

"What's wrong, Zoe?" Josh wondered. "I heard you sigh. Are you okay with this whole swapping thing?" Zoe started up the car and navigated to the roadway.

"Yeah, I am." Zoe answered. "It's just different. I don't know if this is all worth it, you know?"

"True, but how would we know how the others live." He stated as he watched the buildings pass. "Take Liz for example. She got her chest swapped out with Kiran, so she will won't have back pain for next several days. Kiran, on the other hand, will now know what big breasted women will have to go through, plus she is now classified as a man now too. I wonder how that is going to work out." He chuckled to himself just thinking about it.

Zoe couldn't help but chuckle too. "Yeah, I guess I got off lightly, huh?"

"You sure did, Steven and I on the other hand." Josh looked down at his transformed body and sighed.

"Oh, it won't be too bad and we will have fun too." She said as she turned left down another road. "Just do me a favor and try to play along with my husband."

"I will." Josh said as he yawned. As he continued to watch the buildings pass, he felt a wave of drowsiness pass over him and couldn't help but fall asleep.

*** Checking in with Steven ***


Steven had a worried look on his face as he got out of Liz's car at his new home for the next several days. 'You can do this, Steven.' He thought to himself as if trying to psych himself up. He rummaged through his pockets to find the key that will lead to his new life. He soon found it and unlocked the door to find Eric coming around the corner.

"Hey, Stevie." He said as he helped Steven get his jacket. "How was your night? I hope they didn't run you too ragged." He took his jacket and started to hang it up in the closet.

"Oh it wasn't too bad." Steven replied back with Liz's voice. "I think I just need to sit down and relax for a moment or two." He then made his way to the bedroom and changed into something a little more comfortable, a pair of old pajama pants and a T-Shirt. As he made his way over to the couch, Eric motioned for him to come closer. He did as he was asked and sat next to him, and he seemed so small compared to him, thanks to Liz's height.

"How about we have a seat and watch a movie." Eric suggested as he turned on a movie and grabbed a blanket. Together they sat on the couch and watched the movie. As the movie started, Steven found himself leaning on Eric's shoulder and soon found his arm wrapped around him. He felt so safe in his embrace, almost as if nothing could harm him.

Seeing what was happening, Steven sat up quickly and shook his head and felt his longer hair hit his face. 'What's going on?' He thought to himself. 'With Kiran's interests, do I now find men attractive?' He was soon brought out of his thoughts by Eric asking him if anything was wrong. He turned to Eric. "No, not at all. I just thought I forgot to do something back at the store." He lied and laid back down on Eric shoulder.

*** Meanwhile with Arissia ***


As soon as she got in the car with Josh's wife, Arissia was taken aback at how she looked. Even though she was 5' 2" tall, Marcie was a ball of energy that few could stop. Her reddish hair and beautiful face, she seemed wonderful. "Sooo... How was your night, honey?" She asked her new spouse, not really knowing that an hour before, she was a 7 year old child.

"Oh, it was different." Arissia replied back with a smile. "Do you know anything different about me?" Marcie took a moment at a red light to look over to her, to take her in and see if she could spot what was different.

"Did you do something different with your hair?" She asked as she brought her attention back to the road and proceeded down the road. "Did Zoe help you with it again?"

Arissia smiled as she realized that she didn't notice a thing. "Yeah, do you like it." Marcie nodded. "Zoe helped me style it differently."

"I think it looks nice on you." Marcie said with a grin. "So I guess you weren't too busy tonight, huh?"

Arissia shook her head. "No not at all, a couple manicures and a wax. That was it." Arissia was surprised to know how to do all those in her head.

"Well, perhaps you can help me out with a new style when we get home." Marcie asked as they turned down another road. "Why should I be married to a hairstylist, if I don't get some treatments at home." She chuckled at her little joke.

*** Back with Josh and Zoe ***


Zoe looked in the rear view mirror to see Josh passed out in his booster seat. She took a minute to think about all that happened. Sure according to everyone else, he was now considered her 7 year old daughter named Carly. But to her, he was Josh, a poor guy that got too caught up in a game of poker. Soon they found their way to the small bungalow that she and her family called home. As she pulled in the driveway, Josh woke up from his slumber in the back seat and asked. "Where are we?"

"We're home." Zoe announced as she got out of the car. She went over and opened Josh's door for him and helped him out of the car. "Don't forget Arissia's, I mean, your stuff." She pointed to the bag that was sitting nearby. He nodded as he grabbed it and put in on, taking care not to get his hair caught up in the straps. They made their way up the steps and opened the door. "Now, I need you to get ready for a ba..." She was soon interrupted by Chris, her husband walking out of the kitchen.

"There are my girls." He said with a smile as he knelt down with his arms open. He sat there for a moment as if he was waiting for something and Josh knew what he was waiting for. Josh ran over to him with his arms open to and soon found him in his embrace. "I hope you were good for your Mum."

"I was Daddy." He replied as he tried to keep the nausea that he felt about the entire thing.

"I'm glad that you were good for her." He said. "Now, I do believe your in need of a bath." He then swatted his bum as if to say, 'Hey time to get going.' Josh nodded and followed Zoe to the bathroom to get clean.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.title: Josh goes to his new home.

choices: The next day, Josh gets a call about school being cancelled.
The next day, Josh has to go to school.
Checking in on some of the adults.
1553311321131311111111111222111322231121.content:
Carly felt odd going back home for the night. She was now considered a 17 year old with everyone around her. She pulled into the parking lot of the flat that she was renting out since her divorce from the previous year. It had been a nasty one and even though there weren't any kids involved, she was glad that her friends were there for her. Without them, she didn't know where she would be now. She took out her key for her door and unlocked it and noticed that her neighbor Mrs. Johanson was coming out. "Hey there Josh." She greeted Carly. "Just now getting home?" Carly nodded. "Must have been a long night, huh?"

"Yeah, you have no idea." Carly replied back to her. She waved her good bye as she closed the door and locked it behind her. Letting out a sigh, she quickly got comfortable. She made her way over to her bedroom and immediately noticed a bookshelf that wasn't there when she left this morning. With great curiosity, she made her way over to it and noticed several shelves filled with romance, pirates, and many shirtless men. 155332111131.content:
Steven sighed as he descended the stairs and emerged onto the shop floor, he was the last of his little cards group to do so. "Ahh Steven, there you are love." Liz smiled at him, glancing at her watch momentarily. "Can you go and give Natalie a hand on toiletries please." she told him. Steven just acted dumbfounded at first. How could Liz not see that he was now a hotch potch of parts, an amalgamation of parts from three of his younger female co-workers?

"Um... sure Liz." Steven muttered in reply. He still had his own voice amazingly, as well as his own name of course. But he was technically now a 17-year old girl, and he even had the social life of one too. He was even dressed in Kiran's clothes, while he knew most of his clothing at home had no doubt been replaced with the majority of Jade's wardrobe.

"Why are you just standing there there?" Liz asked, when she saw Steven studying the dark skin on 'her' hands. Liz now viewed Steven as a girl, thanks to him having Suki's gender. The same went for Rob, who had Kiran's gender as well as her voice. But compared to Steven's changes, Rob had got off lightly in their little game of cards.

"Hmm, nothing. I'm on my way." Steven sighed. "Help Natalie right?"

Liz nodded, gesturing the way. "Oh and don't forget to get some ladders. I don't want to see you standing on the shelves to reach the top shelves, okay love." she said to him.

"Gotcha!" Steven nodded. Then he noticed for the first time how much shorter than Liz (four inches) he now was. He shook his head and ran his fingers through Suki's former hair, before setting off to where Natalie was currently working.

********

Meanwhile, Suki had started working with Helen, where she had been assigned. And with Steven's gender, muscles and his penis between her legs, she felt... empowered. Working was much easier. She had a silly little smile on her face the whole time while she worked, much to Helen's amusement. Suki also loved her new Caucasian skin tone and short hair. Bringing the cards to work had been a briliant idea.

"Suki, are you feeling okay?" Helen asked Suki, who she now viewed as a man, and not just because of the 'equipment' between Suki's legs.

"I've never been better." Suki giggled, as she scratched her stubbly face. She actually even liked her new body hair, which she thought was fun to have. Since she now had Jade's work knowledge though, Suki didn't find it all that easy working on the stationary aisle. (Jade's usual section was toiletries). Products were hard to find on the shelf, but it was no problem, she just asked Helen whenever she couldn't find anything.

The time flew by as Suki enjoyed herself with her new traits.

********

Kiran though was probably the most contented by the results of the game upstairs. She was now viewed as a 36-year old man, thanks to her swapping ages with Steven and genders with Rob. And she relished being taller, everything seemed so much smaller around her. She chuckled in her new, deeper voice as she straightened the glasses on her face.

Even thought Suki had got most of Steven's muscles, Kiran had his arms and hands, and she found working was easier too. Especially when it came to grabbing and picking up big boxes and the like. Steven's clothes were also so much more comfortable than her own had been.

At least I won't have to deal with Felicity talking my ear off. Kiran chuckled to herself, thinking of one of her friends... who was now Steven's friend, along with Katie, Megan, Sophie, Kylie, Samantha and all her other acquaintances. She'd miss some of them to be sure, but this was so much more fun. She figured being classed as a man - she'd get more respect from people.

Sad thing was, she was probably right.

********

Jade wasn't all that affected (physically) by the little game of cards she had upstairs with her co-workers. Well, she had Steven's longer legs and larger feet and Rob's muscles, but compared to Suki and Kiran, she had got off lightly. She missed her piercings, but what bothered her most strangely enough was the knowledge that she now had most of Steven's clothes at home instead of her own.

There was also the fact that she couldn't get used to everyone calling her 'Rob'. She was still classed as a girl, but now she had a guy's name. Weird!

"Rob?" A voice suddenly called out to her. There it was again. Jade rolled her different colored eyes and turned, ready to scowl at the person talking to her. Until she saw Liz standing there..

"Oh... er... hi Liz." she mumbled nervously.

"Any reason you're just standing around?" Liz quizzed her.

Jade couldn't think up an excuse. "Er... no, just thinking, sorry Liz." Jade muttered.

Liz sighed. "Well, can you think while you're working. I'd appreciate it Rob." she said.

Jade quietly got back to work, grumbling to herself while Liz moved on to check on someone else.

********

Rob, despite being 'afflicted' with the least number of changes, was not as happy as Suki and Kiran, and he wasn't as 'curious' as Steven was or as 'indifferent' as Jade. He was now viewed as a girl thanks to his gender swap with Kiran, and he even had her voice to match. All the piercings that now adorned his face and body were already getting annoying, as was his lack of physical strength thanks to his series of swaps with Jade. Great. he grumbled, glancing down at the feminine, black, lace-up shoes on his feet (also Jade's).

The first thing he'd done on returning to the shop floor was have a chat with Laura, and he winced every time she called him 'Jade'.

"Oh well, at least I'm not as worse off as Steven." he shrugged his shoulders as he worked.

And a part of Rob was amazed by what the cards had been capable of. Transferring traits from one person to another... was mindblowing. And he knew he would want to take part in another round some time in the future.

Kiran was loving not having to use a ladder to put products on the top shelf. It was like she was free, free to reach for the sky without any assistance. "I wonder if Felicity has gotten a hold of Steven yet." She said mostly to herself. "But I am free from that too. This is going to be awesome." She noticed that Steven didn't have many mates to hang out with, but she was sure that she would find some down at the pub. 'Maybe, Suki or Jade will go with me.' She thought to herself but was brought out of her thoughts when Liz came up to her.

I mean Jade had the muscles from Rob and everything, but it looked like she wasn't having fun. "I will need to make sure to talk to her when the shift is over to see what is going on." She said mostly to herself as she made her way to the office. After a few minutes, she was finally at the door and she knocked on it.

"Come in." was the reply from Elizabeth. Kiran opened the door and saw Steven already sitting down with the messy bun style on his head. "Have a seat, don't worry, your not in trouble." She said with a smile.

"Whats going on Elizabeth?" Steven said as he pulled some hair out of his face and tucked it behind his ear.

"Well, I got some good news." She said to them. "I just hired a new employee and he is going to be starting tomorrow evening. The only thing is he isn't British."

"Okay, is he French, German, what?" Kiran said to her.

"Well, he's American and his wife was transferred to a nearby university and he just gained citizenship here and was wanting to do something rather than stay at home." Elizabeth said to them. "He said he's worked in stores before and would just need a refresher."

"Not a problem, I am sure we can make him feel at home." Kiran said to her and she winked over to Steven.
