"Sounds like a plan. " Suki nodded. "We'll fill Steven in on it tomorrow." she said.

"Okay then." Kiran said, raising her glass to Suki's.
155332111131122.title: The shift is over.

choices: Move forward to before the start of the shift.
1553321111311221.content:
As Steven got home from his first night in his changed form he was actually tired. Having to talk to Felicity most of the night, something about her ex-boyfriend seeing another girl. Even though they had broken up last week, apparently she thought that they had to be single until she found somebody. Steven now knew why he stayed at home, he didn't have to deal with most of the drama. "At least, I have to get through today and I can switch back tomorrow." Steven said to himself as he got up for the day. He walked over to the closet to see how much his wardrobe had changed, he wasn't able to see it the night before. He opened the doors and was astonished at what he saw. All his new clothes were not as girly as he thought they would be. "Mostly trousers and T-shirts, I thought I liked Jade for a reason." He said as a smile crept across his face. Steven then looked at the time and knew he needed to start getting ready for his shift.

*** *** ***


Suki woke up the next day a changed woman, or man - as it was. She looked down toward her feet and noticed that her new member was now standing at attention ready to meet the day. "What am I supposed to do with this?" She said as she got out of her bed and stretched. She waited for several minutes and noticed that it started to go down. "Thank goodness," She then thought about the night before with Kiran. She thought about the idea that she proposed and decided that she would get with Steven to see if he would be up for it too. "I wonder if the new guy would be up for it?" She said to herself as she hopped in the shower to get ready for her day.

*** *** ***


Rob wasn't able to sleep much the night before. The new piercings that he received from Jade continued to bother him. 'The nipple ones were by far the worse' he thought to himself. He got out of his clothes and turned on the radio and noticed that it was already set to a pop station. "This must be one of Kiran's favorite stations to listen to." He said as he soon found himself singing along to Katie Perry.

*** *** ***


Kiran was ready to tackle the day head on. She got ready with a new fervor and quickly found herself back in Steven's uniform which she just got done washing. "I have to admit, I like these pants, they certainly fit better than the high waisted ones that I usually wear. I hope we can get some more players to go along with the game tomorrow, it certainly would be nice to experience new things. I might even follow suit with Suki and swap my vagina out." She said to herself.

*** *** ***


Jade didn't feel any different. While she enjoyed having the muscles. She stood several minutes posing in the mirror and enjoyed the fun that she had the night before with the stocking she had to do. "I might play again, but I don't know, I will have to think about it." she said to herself as she looked in the mirror.
1553321111311221.title: Skipping to tomorrow.

15533211113112211.content:
When Suki walked into work a half hour before the shift was due to begin, Kiran was already sat in the tea room with a cup of tea (what Steven usually drank). And she was talking to herself in Hindi, with Rob's deeper voice, grinning. When she saw Suki she smiled, then she couldn't help but notice the obvious bulge in Suki's trousers. "You excited or something?" she had to ask.

Suki rolled her eyes as she pulled up a seat. "Thing's got a mind of it's own." she grumbled. "Feels nice though." she smirked.

"Hmm, must say I'm tempted to try one out myself. You know... since everyone sees me as a man anyway." Kiran said. "So how was your night?" she asked Suki, expecting details.

"It was... interesting." Suki chuckled. "Oh... and your Hindi is flawless by the way. I still think it's weird that I don't know how to speak in my native language anymore." she continued. She then instantly changed the subject. "I brought the cards, don't worry." she smirked, producing the pack from her pocket. She put them on the table for a moment, then pocketed them again. She didn't want to mislay them or have them stolen.

"So we still playing another round later?" Kiran asked.

"I haven't asked any of the others yet. But yeah... I'm definitely in."

"I can ask Jade and Rob if you want. Though I doubt Rob will agree to another round. He's probably still pouting like a girl, it seems my gender suits him." Kiran laughed, as she offered to speak to two of her co-workers for Suki.

"That'd work." Suki nodded. "I'll have a word with Steven, and then I can see if I can get Liz to join us later." she grinned in excitement. Kiran had to admit, the idea of their supervisor joining them was thrilling.

"What about the new guy?" Kiran asked.

"Soon as we meet him, we can talk to him together if you want, invite him in." Suki shrugged.

Kiran fidgeted in her seat. "I think Elizabeth is still inducting him in her office." she mumbled.

"Well, we're not ready yet anyway." Suki said. And at that moment Steven walked into the tea room. Still as short and dark-skinned as when he left, and attired in Kiran's work uniform. His tits formed two modest mounds under his shirt and there was no sign of a bulge in his waist-high trousers. "Hey 'girl'." Suki chuckled as Steven sat down next to them, sweeping his hair from his face.

"Very funny." Steven sighed. Kiran still couldn't get used to seeing her cute face attached to Steven's head, along with Suki's hair and skin tone. She straightened her glasses and smiled at him nonetheless.

The 'girls' then proceeded to inform Steven of the plans for the day. He was willing to participate in another round of cards, even though he was eager to reverse his current swaps with Suki, Kiran and Jade.

"All right then. Just several more people to ask." Suki beamed, she didn't tell Steven though that she was planning to invite Liz to join them too.

He'd find that out later.
15533211113112211.title: Move forward to before the start of the shift.

choices: Steven starts to work with the new guy.
155332111131122111.content:
Jade and Rob arrived shortly after Steven arrived and they sat down at the same table. "Still sulking 'Jade'?" Kiran said to Rob putting an accent on his new name.

"I'm not sulking, I'm just not happy at the moment. Can we swap back yet?" Rob wondered, toward Suki and Kiran

"No we can't swap back until tomorrow and then we can play another round if you two are up for it." Suki said to them both.

Rob and Jade both looked down at their shoes and shook their heads. "I don't think I'll play tomorrow night. I might play again in the future, but I think I am good for right now." Rob said back with Kiran's voice.

"That's fine, I think we have a couple of new people lined up. If you want in a future game let us know and we will certainly try and get you in." Suki said to them both. Just then they heard something from the doorway.

"Alright guys, can I have your attention please." Elizabeth announced. "We have a new employee starting work with us tonight, so Steven and Kiran, I want you two to make sure he knows the ins and outs of the store and have him start in an area so that we can gauge how he is." She then turned around to look for somebody and asked him to come forward. "This is Joshua, he will be with us for the foreseeable future. Care to introduce yourself, luv?"

"Yes ma'am," He started to say with a different accent they were used to.

"No need to call me that, everyone calls me Elizabeth." She said to him.

"Right, Elizabeth. Hi, I'm Josh and I am from the U.S. I moved over here with my wife, she is from here originally and got accepted to teach at a nearby university I am looking forward to working with you." He said to the group.

Elizabeth then motioned for Steven and Kiran to move forward "This is Steven and Kiran, they are going to help you in getting settled in. They will also give you a section to start working. I am sure it's the same as from where you worked."

The three of them soon were gone, giving the new guy a tour of the store. "The rest of you know what to do, I want you all to go to the same sections as last night." Liz said to them as they all groaned and made their way downstairs. "Yes Suki what is it?"

"Well, Steven and I were wondering if you would like to join us in a game of cards tomorrow night, I can guarantee you that it will be life altering. Oh, can you also talk to Carly to see if she would like to join us too?" Suki asked her.

"I will have to think about it, but I will let you know before the end of the shift and I will give Carly a ring to see if she would like to join us." Liz said to her. "Now let's head downstairs and start the night, shall we?" Suki nodded as they headed downstairs to begin their shift.

*** *** ***


Steven and Kiran were showing the new guy around. "So Joshua, where are you from originally?" Kiran asked

"It's Josh, Joshua is for when I get in trouble." He quipped back at Kiran. "Originally, I am from Oklahoma."

"Oh, is that where the tornadoes and all the indians are?" Kiran asked him.

"Yes, sir. That is where they got moved to as for the tornadoes, they aren't that bad." He said back "They can real beautiful if you know what your looking at."

"I knew you were from a different place than most of the sort that come in here." Kiran said to him as they made their way to the Goods In area. Steven and Kiran both explained the process that is done and how they need to get it done in an orderly manner.

*** About an hour later ***


Suki was working in the Stationary section again when she heard somebody come up behind her. "Hey luv." Liz said behind her. "About tomorrow night, I think I will join you and I gave Carly a ring and she said that we can go over there after the shift is over."

"Great, I will let everyone else know. Thanks." Suki said back to her supervisor.

"What is supposed to happen with this game of yours?" Liz wondered.

Suki then told her what they did and how she will never see life the same again. "I know you won't believe it, but I used to not look like this. I used to be a girl. But just come tomorrow it will all make sense to you." Suki said with a smile.

*** *** ***


Kiran soon put Josh to work in the Toiletries section and went to find Suki. She soon found her with Liz and as she approached, they went their separate ways. "What was that about?" Kiran asked Suki.

"Oh, she was just telling me that Carly and her are in for tomorrow night. All we have to do is find another guy to replace Rob." Suki replied back to her.

"About that, I think the new guy is definitely interested." Kiran told her with a grin on her face.

Suki was happy to hear it too, she was sure that he had some nice additions to give to the game.
155332111131122111.title: Jade and Rob arrive.

1553321111311221111.content:
The day finally arrived that everyone was waiting for, swap back day. Rob was grateful for this day, it meant that he could get these things off of him and swap his voice back. That is what bothered him the most, it wasn't being called ma'am by the yank. "I will have to give him a talking to after I get swapped back." he told himself as he put Jade's shoes on and headed out the door.

*** *** **


Kiran was indifferent about the day. She was really enjoying her new height and perhaps she could bet it again so that she could be taller than the 5' she was usually. She looked through her work outfits to see if she could find Steven's, but she couldn't find it. Instead she put on one of her extra ones so that she could get to work and get ready for tonight's game.

*** *** ***


Jade was ready to get her piercings back. She thought that's what made her, her. "I have to admit, I am liking the shoes. I might have to get Steven to swap with me again." She said to herself as she got Rob's shoes back on from the day of the swap. "Well, time to go back to being plain old me" She said to the mirror as she flexed one more time to herself.

*** *** ***


Suki looked at her male form one last time as she started to get dressed. Out of all the things that was swapped with her, she enjoyed the male appendage the most. It certainly made it easier to use the restroom and she didn't have to wait in any lines at the pub to use the toilet. She got dressed in her usual uniform and ran her fingers through her short hair one last time before she left for her shift at Wilko.

*** *** ***


Steven was ready to swap back his height. The main thing that really irritated him was the fact that he had to use ladders all the time to put items on the top shelves. The other thing was the new guy, Josh, calling him ma'am every time he asked him to do something. He was a nice guy, but a little bit too polite for his tastes. Steven quickly got dressed in Kiran's work uniform so that they could swap back here in roughly 30 minutes or so.

*** *** ***


Rob and Jade were the first to arrive and they sat down at a table nearest to the door waiting for the others to come. "What did you think of the whole experience?" Jade asked Rob.

"I didn't like it, I mainly got a girl's voice and your piercings." Rob complained. "Maybe if I got something else, I might of had some more fun."

"So do you think you will play again in the future?" Jade asked him.

"Yeah, I might do it later on, but not anytime soon." Rob replied back and noticed that Steven and Suki just arrived. "Hey girly, how was your time?" Rob asked Steven.

Steven glared at him and tried to look intimidating, but it didn't work with Kiran's face. "Very funny, at least I still have my old voice." he said back to him.

Before Rob could react, Kiran walked back into the room and the Suki grabbed the cards and found the incantation. She spoke words that nobody could hear and after a blinding light, the group looked around and found that they were back to normal... Well Mostly. "I'm sorry Steven, I couldn't find your uniform from that first night so I put on one of my own." Kiran apologized to her friend. "I thought that it would automatically swap it back"

"It's alright, I wore this for the past several days, one more day won't hurt" Steven said back to her as he looked back down at himself to ensure that everything made it over properly. "Now that is cool" Steven replied back to the group.

They nodded, and soon found that Liz and Josh had arrived as well for the next shift.
1553321111311221111.title: Before tomorrow's shift

15533211113112211112.content:
The shift that day was as normal as any other, except there was certainly more excitement in the air (from Kiran and Suki mostly), and even more relief (from Rob and Jade) that they were back to their normal selfs. Steven was somewhere in between. He had been fascinated by the swaps, but just hadn't enjoyed everyone treating him like a 17-year old girl all that much.

But with them all hard at work, the time soon flew by, and before they all knew it, the shift was drawing to a close.

When Suki saw Liz, she had a big grin on her face she couldn't hide from her supervisor. "Are we ready?" she asked her.

Liz just nodded. "Elizabeth is going to lock up tonight, so yes we can nip up to Carly's salon and see her there." she replied to Suki's question. "I must say I'm curious about these cards of yours. If they can do what you claim, well... let's just say I'm sceptical."

"You won't be." Suki smugly reassured her boss.

Outside the store, the group gathered, Kiran, Suki, Steven, Liz... and then Josh nervously arrived. His second day at work and he was already 'hanging out' with his new friends/co-workers. He was as curious as Liz was about what was coming. "Come on then." Liz gestured up the street with her head. Her four staff members followed her dutifully up the street and soon arrived outside Beautylicious.

Stepping inside, the group all caught a whiff of nail varnish, nail polish remover, lipstick and hot wax, all the things you'd associate with a beauty salon. And stood by a table neatening a ling of different colored nail varnishes... they saw a cute looking blonde, no more than 5' 2" tall. She had cropped, stylish hair and was dressed in a black Beautylicious low-cut top, a white pencil skirt and a pair of black patent pumps with metallic-tipped stiletto heels.

"Hi Carly." Liz greeted her friend.

"Looking hot as always." Steven weighed in with his own compliment for his friend.

Carly looked up and smiled, clasping her manicured hands together. "Hey guys, come on in." she chirped in her lovely voice. "So what's this unique 'game' Liz told me about over the phone?" she chuckled.

First.. the introductions were made, since Carly had not met Suki or Kiran personally, and she of course hadn't even seen Josh before. Then after that, Suki more or less took over explaining things from her supervisor. She produced the pack of swapping cards, held them up - and a mischievous grin appeared on her face. "Here's the game Liz was talking about. Let's all have a seat shall we?" she said.

Carly brought a couple of spare chairs from the back of the salon and the group sat around the small table Carly usually used to paint her client's nails. This was after she had locked the door to prevent any disruptions. "You're lucky, Zoe only left a half hour ago, one of her clients was late." Carly explained as she took her seat in between Josh and Suki.

"Too bad, she could have joined us." Kiran smirked. "But no matter, we'll still have fun." she said, looking forward to what was coming.

"Hmm, I'm intrigued." Carly smiled, resting her elbows on the table and in turn resting her head in her hands.

For her part, a curious Liz just looked on, glancing between Steven, Suki and Kiran.

And Josh... remained silent for the time being, not sure what to say.
15533211113112211112.title: Skip to that tonight.

155332111131122111121.content:
Suki began to deal the cards out and everyone looked at their cards. "Does everyone know the wagers?" Suki asked. Everyone but Josh and Carly nodded their head. As if on queue, some holographic cards appeared on the table in front of each of the players.

"What the hell?" Josh exclaimed as he was surprised by the sudden appearance of the cards in front of them.

"Told you that they would change your life, just wait until you win a hand." Kiran said. "Suki, since you dealt, you bet first."

"Right, I bet my feet." Suki announced as a holographic display of her feet displayed above her. Josh didn't know what was going on. With his Degree in Geology, he looked for an answer, but no matter how much he looked he couldn't find anything that would explain what he was seeing in this room.

"What's wrong, can't find it can you?" Suki asked as she looked over to Josh. He just shook his head. "Steven, it's your go."

"I bet my legs" He announced as his legs appeared above his head.

"I bet my chest, these things are heavy and I don't mind getting rid of them for a little bit." Liz announced as her breasts (with nipples) appeared. This gave Josh and Carly a fright as they weren't expecting the nipples to be shown too.

"I will bet my torso and feet." Kiran announced as her thin waist and narrow shoulders appeared along with her feet.

Josh was at a loss and just decided to go with it, he was always for an adventure and a new experience. "I bet my DVD collection and my legs too." What appeared to be 4 boxes filled with DVDs appeared and his legs soon came above his head.

"Are all those DVDs?" Kiran wondered as she looked at the boxes.

"Yeah, when I was in college, I used to work for a movie theater and I stocked up on movies because I got a discount." Josh answered back.

"So it's my go, right?" Carly wondered as she looked at the group.

"Yes, luv, it is." Liz answered back to her.

"I bet my hair, hands, and my name." Carly said as she saw her hair style, hands, and her name tag appear above her head. Suki looked at her cards and decided to fold. Steven and Liz soon filed suit.

"I will raise the pot with my gender." Kiran said as the female symbol soon hovered above her head. Both Josh and Carly looked at their hands to ensure that they thought they could win. They both decided that they didn't want to risk it and soon folded their hands.

"Looks like you win this one." Suki said as she noticed all the wagers that all the players made soon found themselves in front of Kiran and the holographic figures of the characters soon showed up to receive their new traits.

"Okay, now Steven, I am going to take your legs and I always wanted to try a bigger bust, so I will try out Liz's for the time being." Kiran announced as she slid these traits into her figure. Josh and Carly both watched in awe as they saw Kiran's bosom expand and Liz's deflate at the same time until they mirrored each others breasts. "Now Carly, I think you might enjoy longer hair so I will give your hair to Suki and you can have her shoes. They might be more comfortable than those you have right now. Now, Josh, I'm want to try out your DVD collection, but I am not going to take it, I will give you my torso as compensation."

Josh then looked down to see his waist narrow down and his chest and shoulders become smaller to match hers. "Let me guess, you needed something bigger to support your new additions?" Josh wondered as he gestured toward her now ample bosom.

Kiran nodded "Very good observation, just for that, I think I will give you Carly's hands and legs." She said as she brought the last 2 traits over to his character and dropped them off. "Trust me Carly, you will enjoy the legs over the next several days. Guy legs seem to be much better at standing around and you won't even get as tired." Josh looked down to see that he lost a good inch or two in height with the latest swap. He raised up his dainty hands to see the french tip manicure now decorating them.

"How can you do anything with these nails" he replied to Carly

"Oh, you will get used to it after a day or two." She replied back to Josh "I can give you some tips after we are done, if you want." Josh nodded as Steven gathered up the cards and got ready for another hand.
155332111131122111121.title: Suki deals the cards.

1553321111311221111211.content:
Steven gathered up the cards and dealt them out to the players for the next round. While the cards were being dealt, Carly looked at her new hands, "Josh you really need to look into getting some hand lotion. They are really dry, but don't worry, I will take care of them while I have them for you."

"Thanks, I guess" He replied back to her as he looked down at his hand to see if he hand anything good. "He noticed that he had 2 pair, they were pretty low, but he might be able to bluff his way to a win.

"Since I dealt, I will lead off," Steven said as he looked at his cards. "I bet my pants." As his pants floated above.

"I will bet my face and arms" Liz announced as she glanced up to see her own face and her arms. "This still freaks me out how lifelike it all looks." Everybody nodded at this comment as they looked at her traits above her.

"I think I will bet my work experience and my hips." Kiran said as a clipboard appeared with papers and some female hips also. The hips were moving back and forth like she was walking.

"You know what, I think I will call with my feet." Carly replied back. "Lets see what you got?" Carly laid down her cards to show her 3 of a kind.

"Now to hand out the goodies." Carly announced as she looked over the spoils. "Steven, I think I will give you Liz's arms, but I will take those pants of yours." She slid his pants onto her character and saw her skirt morph into a pair of black trousers. "Josh, luv, since you have my legs, I will give you my feet." She then leaned over to whisper in his ear. "They match my hands." He could feel his feet start to shrink slightly until they matched her old feet. "Josh I will give your current outfit to Suki and I will help you out by giving out Kiran's work experience to help you out."

Josh looked down to see that he was wearing her Wilko polo shirt, a Wilko fleece jacket and a pair of of tight black trousers. He then felt something around his chest and a slight constriction on his groin and some tugging in this ears as he reached up to feel that they were now pierced and also noticed that his wedding ring was now on on Suki's hand instead of his own. He opened up his jacket and polo shirt to see that he now had a light pink bra under his shirt.

"Yeah, that got swapped too, but don't worry too much." Steven said to him with a reassuringly good manner.

"Now Kiran, I will give your face to Steven and then I will give Liz's face to you." Carly announced as she slid all the parts to their appropriate new owners. "Suki, since Josh now has my hands and feet, I think you will let me borrow yours. Oh, and Josh to help you fill out your new pants, I will give you Kiran's hips too. I think I will hold onto my childhood memories for right now, but I might try it later on."

Josh looked down at his pants to see that they started to flair out slightly as his bones rearranged to match those of a 17 year old female, and he tried to remember all the previous jobs that he had. "Umm... when you swapped our work experience, you took all of them. All I remember is working in the departments at Wilko. Not the jobs in College and High School, just this one. But it's only for a couple days and I don't think anyone will call me in that time." He said out loud but mostly to himself.

"What?" Kiran wondered as she thought back. She remembered the movie theater job, where she cleaned the theaters and worked the box office, working in the clothing store and the office supply stores too. "This is so cool." She said to the group.
1553321111311221111211.title: Hand 2 (A)

15533211113112211112111.content:
Liz gathered up the cards and started to deal them out. She handed out the proper number to all the players and then looked down at her hand to see what she dealt herself. She actually had a decent hand and would try to win this one. She knew she had to put 1 point down to start the game. "I will bet my hands." She said as her hands soon materialized above her head.

Kiran looked and decided to bet too. "I will bet my hair and I will put my muscles in too, it was fun last time." She said giggling as her musculature appeared above her.

Josh then said. "Let's see what you girls have." As he said this, he looked over at Suki and Carly as he got ready to lay his cards down. He had 2 pair, 8s and 10s, which beat Suki's and he looked over to Carly. His heart started to beat faster with anticipation, would he actually win this round. Carly lay down her hand too. "Alright, Kiran, I know you enjoyed having muscles the last time, so I will help you this time. I will give your muscles and hair to Steven. Steven, luv, I think you look like a darling with your current look." Carly said as she looked at her friend who now looked smaller, but he had a lovely head of hair on his head. "But I think this will look good too," she said as she dragged Liz's hands over to him. "And regarding lips, I think Josh will love mine for the next couple days, but I will take your lovely eyes." Josh felt his lips and eyes tingle, but only for a moment. He brought his hands up to his lips and felt that they now felt fuller. "I think I will give you my nail care Skills, that way you can take care of my manicure while it's on your hands and I think I will keep my skin right now, but I will give you Suki's body hair, since you pretty much look like a young lady"

He then thought about the other changes and looked at his hands and now knew what to do to keep them longer and how to moisturize. Glancing over to Carly he noticed that she now had his blue eyes, which meant that he now had her hazel eyes.
15533211113112211112111.title: Hand 3 (A)

choices: Everyone agrees and they use the booths to check themselves out.
155332111131122111121111.content:
Kiran gathered up the cards and dealt them out to the awaiting players. Everyone got them and looked. Josh was starting to have a hard time with the cards since getting Carly's hands, but once he got the skills from her they started to become easier to deal with. Kiran looked at the cards and made her bet. "I will bet my feet." She announced as they were now shown above her head.
